Sasha was humming some tune which you couldn't recognize over the sound of water, but it was almost like a siren's song to you. You pulled the shower curtain to the side quietly, and stepped in behind the lovely wet woman before you. From behind you could see her long black hair cascading down her back, and the water running down her back, being channeled between her lovely tan ass cheeks. You wondered for a moment what ethnicity she was, with an ass like that, and straight black hair, she must be a mix of something. But whatever it was, you were in love with it already...

You assumed Sasha had heard you come in, but was simply playing coy and waiting for you to join in. Before today you'd never showered with another girl before, let alone as a girl yourself. You hoped that new memories would appear to help guide you, or you might be in for a fast learning experience...
11133111132211.title: In the shower with Sasha

As she walked away she had an extra sway to her hips that called every ounce of your attention. You quickly followed behind her and joined her in the room. We could hit that new club you Bri was talking about the other day.”

Both possibilities sounded good, you were quickly learning to enjoy the benefits of spending alone time with Sasha, but going out with your beautiful girlfriend was also an enticing.

1113311113221112.content:
"Let's go out," you said. Now that you had this hot girlfriend you wanted to show her off like a man would show off his girlfriend. You didn't know that in this relationship you were actually the hotter one.

"You want me to go out with you??? Then you have to do something for me," Sasha replied

"What...anything."

"I want you to join cheer."

"But I thought we discussed this. I'm not much of a joiner."

"I don't care, if you can join me in the shower you can join me on cheer squad."

"But..."

"You said anything."

"OK, OK. I'll join." There wasn't much doubt anymore. Bill had been hesitant since he thought he might go back to his 'old life.' But with his new relationship with Sasha there was no going back. That is what he thought now. He really wasn't thinking too far ahead. He was still thinking with his 'penis' even though he didn't have one anymore.

"Good, I knew you would see it my way. Now if you are going to join cheer, then you'll have to see my manicurist."

"I do?"

"Look at those fingernails," Sasha said after taking Bill's hand and showing him his nails. They weren't shaped right (for a girl) and they didn't even have one coat of clear polish on them. "You can't be on the squad like that. You'll have to paint them in the school colors.''

"I guess you are right."

"One other thing, I want you to start wearing short skirts. You have great legs, I want to see them more often."

Defeated in a way, Bill said "OK OK, is there anything else?"
1113311113221112.title: Go out

11133111132211123.content:
“Aw, Bae, hey, look, I’m sorry, I didn’t mean to sound so … bossy,” said Sasha, noticing your look and the defeated tone of your voice. She reached out to you and gently guided you to the bed and sat you next to her. You looked her, a small smile creeping onto your lips, “I think you meant to say the other “B” word.” You both chuckled at that and she pushed you softly, shoulder to shoulder. “Hey, that’s mean … but I guess I deserved that. Listen, Bae, I really would love for you to join the cheer squad. You’re not just my girlfriend, you’re my best friend and I really would like to share something I love with the woman I love,” she explained, putting her hand on yours. You grabbed her hand and squeezed it tightly, “I love you to,” you said softly, astonished at how genuine those words felt.


“I don’t want you to join only for that to push us apart, so if you don’t want to join that’s fine, I won’t force you. I know I can be … pushy at times and I can be a bit … uh … more assertive than I need to be, that’s one of my flaws, but I don’t ever want to hurt you,” Sasha continued, tears welling in her eyes.


“Hey, Sash, it’s ok, you don’t have to cry, I know you didn’t mean to be mean or anything. I know you have your flaws; I have mine too. I know cheerleading is important to you, and you’re so important to me,” you said, embracing her tightly, “I’ll join the cheer squad with you,” you continued. You felt her straighten up a bit, about to say something, but you cut her off before she could say anything, “Listen, don’t worry, I Want to do this, I want to join, not just for you, but for us.”


“You are just so corny,” Sasha replied with that smile of hers that make your heart skip a beat every time. She jumped around and knocked you back on the bed, pinning you against it. “Is that going to be a problem?” you asked her laughing. “Maybe, but I guess I can forgive your corniness,” Sasha said, beaming, but then her smile faltered, “Are you really going to join?”


“Yes, I’ll join, Sash,” you replied, smiling up at her. Sasha collapsed on top of you and then snuggled up next to you. “That means so much to me! And you don’t have to worry about your nails or shorter skirts, I was just … well, you’ve been so busy lately with classes and training and stuff that we haven’t gone to get a mani-pedi in forever and I miss that. And you know I love how beautiful your legs are, but I don’t want to boss you around, I’m so sorry…” Sasha started to say, tension rising in her voice, but you cut her off, “Hey, hey, I know you didn’t mean to be mean to me Sash, it’s ok. I shouldn’t be so think skinned either,” you tell her and then you glance over at your nails. “And you’re right, I definitely need to get my nails done,” you added, with a bit of Bri’s original fashion sense kicking in, “They do look terrible don’t they?”


“They do! I’m sorry,” Sasha laughed, “But those legs of yours don’t …” Sasha said, trailing off, trying to look innocent and failing miserably. “Oh, really?!” you told her, pushing her away jokingly. She pushed you back and then snuggled up next to you again. The two of you lay there for a minute, simply enjoying the moment. After a while you nudged her, “Hey, it’s still not that late, what do you saw we go …”
11133111132211123.title: Reader's choice

choices: You head straight to the nail salon for a mani-pedi.
111331111322111231.content:
"What do you say we go get that manicure? Ever since you mentioned it i just can't stop looking at how uugh my nails are. There's still time!" You were surprised to have ever heard yourself say this combination of words, but you actually meant it.

Bri's fashion sense had definitely helped you see the world of beauty in a new light. With just a few reality changes, you'd been blessed with this amazing body and an incredible girlfriend who is all about that body. You knew that if you were going to stay this way for any length of time, you'd have to work to maintain this life. That meant not just giving yourself Alex's fitness, but dieting and exercising to keep that up. And not just Bri's sense of style, but putting work into your hygiene and appearance to not let that style go to waste.

"Yyyyyessssss!" Sasha jumped straight off the bed in excitement, her bare tits floating in freefall as she sailed through the air towards the closet. She nearly crashed into several pieces of furniture, but stuck the landing, she was a gymnast and cheerleader after all. You couldn't help but grin at how much this meant to her. And making her happy made you happy, genuinely.

You nearly sat there and started watching her get dressed, until it hit you. Crap I gotta start getting ready too! Can't just pull on some pants and a t-shirt anymore, this is going to take some getting used to! You thought as you sprang into action as well. While Sasha was picking out clothes (for the both of you actually), you hurried to the bathroom and gave your long brunette hair a quick blow dry. Little snippets of Bri's knowledge were coming to you piece by piece, as you went through your new routine. You didn't even have time to acknowledge the fact that you were bare naked still, right in front of a mirror. A part of you somehow knew that the nail salon stopped taking new customers after a certain time, and you needed to be ready quickly.

Once your hair was dry, you rubbed a quick makeup primer over your face, and went to see what Sasha had picked out. You knew this was like a routine between the two of you. Two girls were better than one when it came to efficient morning preparation, at least when you were able to agree on what outfit to wear. But as usual, you saw that Sasha had coordinated both your outfits with matching styles and different colors. You noticed both outfits had rather short pleated black skirts, but you sucked it up, knowing there was no time for arguing.

"Sash, your flat iron is already warmed up and ready to go, I'll take care of the rest of the outfit, alright?" You said, relieving her of outfit duty.

"You're such a doll!" She said, passing you with a quick slap on the butt.

With no time to lose, you scanned the outfit on the bed and had to think fast. What was missing? She had skirts and blouses and camis laid out, but it didn't seem like full outfit yet. It was too hot out for stockings or leggings, so that was out… What else was there? Then you saw the problem, threw the camisoles off the bed, they weren't needed. But the outfit lacked layering now…

"AH! The Kimono cardigans!" You blurted out, not even knowing that was a thing until the knowledge appeared in your mind.

Sasha poked her head around the corner from the bathroom, a makeup brush still in one hand. "Holy shit Bae, you're a fucking genius!"

"I know right?!" You were shocked at yourself, especially when you reached into the closet and knew just where to find a pair of floral kimono cardigans.

They were very thin and sheer, and looked great worn over pretty much any simple, light colored top. One had designs of pink cherry blossoms against a reddish background, while the other had an assortment of teal and purple floral designs, which really stood out as a strangely beautiful combination of colors. You gave that one to Sasha, wanting to see her in it. Plus somehow you felt like pink and red were more your colors anyways.

Now that was settled, you quickly found two pairs of sandals which sort of matched, one with a three inch heel for Sasha, and a very slight one inch heel for yourself, being the taller girl of the two. You were also a little worried that you might eat shit the first time you tried to walk in something too high. With the shoe selection sorted out, you found a pair of red and pink hipster panties to match your cardigan, and a plain pink bra which was close enough.

Once in your underwear, you stepped carefully into the black skirt which reached mid-thigh, and felt like you were wearing nothing at all. It was still loose and a little flowy when you moved, which was great for the hot weather you realized. You popped the blouse on over your head, and left the cardigan on the bed for when you were ready to leave, didn't want to get makeup on it. Speaking of…

"Good timing Bae, makeup's all yours, let me get dressed real quick." Sasha said, walking out of the bathroom with zero clothes and not giving any fucks what you saw. She had on a black ring of smokey eyeliner that really made her eyes look bigger, and you nearly walked right into the bathroom door with the image of her whole frontal view still stuck in your mind.

You knew better than to try and copy her makeup look, or at least, you now suddenly knew. You had Bri's fashion sense, but you hadn't ever transferred her skill for applying makeup. As it turns out, having a fashion sense in this reality meant that you taught yourself how to apply makeup, and had your own style that worked for your face. You didn't have a dark cat eye look like Sasha did, but a much simpler and subtle eyeliner approach, which could be added to or taken away for any formal or casual occasion. For a day at the salon you might glitz it up a little however, it was a special occasion.

With the primer already long set, you began working on autopilot through the foundation and concealer. Your instinctual motor skills were applying contours faster than new memories were coming in, explaining what each color was for. Before you knew it you had an eyeliner pen millimeters from your eye, which would likely have terrified you as Bill, but now your hand only trembled ever so slightly. You drew thin brown lines on the wet line underneath the lashes, merging them out towards the corner of the eye. You didn't bother with much mascara, as it was usually overkill with a look like this. All that was left was a dash of lightly toned eyeshadow and a quick swipe of rose tinted lip balm, and it was set.

When you looked up at the mirror, first you saw what was an incredibly attractive woman staring at you with deep green eyes, but that was you. Then you saw Sasha standing there on her tip toes looking over your shoulder with a stopwatch. "Aaand time. Aw… I don't think it was a new record this time bae… only 5 seconds too slow. But look at us, we're going to destroy this town when we get out there. Once our nails are done, it's over, gg, how could anyone compete? I mean we already crushed Katie's time by a whole two minutes. And she still says she doesn't mind being single, pssh… She's missing out!"

You felt Sasha's hand on your bare thigh, slowly riding up your skirt to give your ass cheek a squeeze, and you saw her smirk in the mirror. You barely noticed, since your heart was still racing. Not from the butt squeeze, but from the intensity of this prep routine! Sasha really pushed you to get faster and better, and it was working! It was like makeup and clothes were a competition to her, and you were loving it. You just hoped you could keep up!

With the two of you standing there staring into the mirror, all dolled up and ready to go, you really did look like a matching couple, with her giving you a casual grope while resting her head on your shoulder. Then she whispered, "Alright this is adorable and all, but we really gotta get going." Sasha handed you your kimono cardigan and pulled you by the hand towards the door.

1113311113221112311.content:
To our utter amazement the two of you found parking not too far from the salon, it helped that Sasha’s car was a small, cute and stylish, red Fiat that would probably fit anywhere. As bill you would have never liked such a car, but Bri had seen such cars as more of a fashion statement than anything else, and now you did instead. To call the place a simple nail salon would be a grand understatement. Located in one of the nicer parts of town, the locale encompassed three floors. The main floor was a hair salon, the second floor housed the nail salon, and the third floor was dedicated to spa treatments, massages, facials and other such services. The moment you stepped in you had memories of being there with Sasha before, but also memories that said that the two of you hadn’t been there together in some time, which made you feel like a neglectful girlfriend.

“Sash, I’m sorry I haven’t made time for us to come here together,” you apologized.

“Oh, don’t worry about it. We’re here now and we’re going to fix the disaster you call nails,” Sasha replied with a grin. You bit your lip, giving her a dirty look, “Hardy har-har, you think you’re so funny,” you said in mock anger. “No darling, I know I’m funny, and you Love it,” she replied with a smug smile. She then turned around and spoke to the woman at the front desk, “Hello, I called in a short while ago, I made an appointment for two spa mani-pedis.”

“Name, please?” replied the woman.

“It should be under Sasha.”

“Ah, yes, I have you here. You were lucky, we don’t usually have appointments on such short notice. Please head on upstairs and the attendant will sit you and your nail technician will be with you momentarily.”

You two walked through the chic establishment and headed up the thin stairs up to the second floor. An attendant guided you to a couple of empty pedicure in the middle of a long row of identical chairs. Most of the chairs were occupied except for the ones you’d been pointed to. Opposite the chairs was a row of tables with normal chairs on opposing sides for manicures. You sad down in the padded, leather chairs and instantly activated the chairs massage feature through a control placed on the right side of the chair. The fact that you knew what the things around you were and what the controls on the chair did was a marvel. In reality this was the first time you’d set foot in such a place, but your memories of life with Sasha spoke differently. Two small Asian women in crisp, black uniforms came over and sat in small stools in front of both you and Sasha. The two women started to fill the tiny pool for your feet and both of you dipped your feet in the hot water. The manicurists started working on you and you breathed a long sigh, feeling the water and the massage chair melt away any tension you had.

“Sasha, you my dear, are a genius,” you told your girlfriend without even opening your eyes. “I know, Bae, I know,” she replied and you could hear the smile in her voice. The two of you relaxed in your chairs for a while, enjoying the pampering and catering from the staff. Sometime after the manicurist had started to scrub your feet with a pumice stone you heard two women loudly walk into the area. “Oh, please Sandra, how is being tall a problem. Try being so short that basically every dress becomes a maxi dress,” complained one as she sat in a chair next to your that must have been vacated while you tuned out. She was admittedly a short woman, perhaps around 4’10, while her companion was the opposite, standing probably somewhere around 6’6”.

“Right, because it’s so easy for me to find clothes my size, Katy. Not to mention finding a man who’s willing to date a woman who’s taller than him. Let alone finding men taller than me and forget wearing high heels! At least they see you as cute and adorable,” retorted Sandra, the taller of the two women. The two continued to bicker loudly for a while and it was really messing with your relaxing mood. A moment later Sasha leaned closer to you and whispered, “I wish they would quiet down a bit, I’m losing my Zen here.”

“I know, right?” you whispered back. You tried to tune them out as best you could, but they seemed to be oblivious to how rude they were being to the other clients. You looked around trying to think of what to do and it was at that point that you saw another woman walk in to the area. She was very elegantly dressed and flawlessly made-up, but her most striking aspect was her hair. She had chestnut hair with golden highlights that cascaded in wavy locks on either side of her head, perfectly framing her face as well as her bosom. “Wow, I love her hair, Bae, it looks stunning. That style would look amazing on you,” whispered Sasha, and you felt a tinge of jealousy.

You sit back, trying to recover the relaxing feeling you’d had earlier, although neither the bickering women nor the tinge of jealousy helped with that. A moment later you …

You suddenly remembered, your hair was already pretty nice! Sure that lady's style was different, and would probably be pretty sexy on you, but you could do without it. It was only last week that you and Sasha had been at the hair salon together, and you knew it wouldn't be the last time.

"Maybe next time I'll see if the stylist can do something new like that with my hair?" You suggested calmly, trying to relax over the sound of the bickering customers.

"That sounds lovely, doll. Oh man will those two just shut it already... jeez..." Sasha muttered so only you could hear.

That settled it, you suddenly swapped the heights of the two women arguing. The formerly tall woman was now 4'10", but was wearing some pretty high platform heels to make up for it. On the other hand, the formerly short woman was now 6'6", and wearing flat shoes, and a dress which had a hem that looked like a mini skirt due to her increased height. For a moment there was finally silence...

"Ugh! I mean, I like wearing heels but I tell you, it's like I can't leave the house without them or I feel like a midget! Really is doing a number on my feet." The now short girl started to complain now.

"Hey don't complain! Guys love a girl in heels, it's sexy! Look at me, I can barely wear a dress without flashing everyone an upskirt! I have to wear super long skirts just to look normal!" The now tall girl complained.

You winced and wished you could just cover your ears with your hands, but you couldn't move them right now! "Oh my god! Still?! I guess the grass is always greener with these two huh? I bet if I averaged them both together they'd find something else to complain about."

Sasha giggled a little, not really knowing what you were talking about, since reality had changed and she had no memory of the first argument. "I'm sure they would Bae, there's nothing you can do about them unless we have the salon ask them to be quiet."

You looked around hoping to find a way to have the bickering women be at peace with their height since swapping it between them didn’t seem to do the trick at all. Of course, you could always just say something to one of the attendants or to them directly, that’s what any normal person would do. However, you were anything but normal and your power gave you unique opportunities. As you thought about it the nail technician dutifully continued to tend to your feet, cutting, rubbing, shaping, etc. The small woman rubbed the sole of your foot and you couldn’t help but giggle from the tickling sensation. You smiled for a moment, figuring you’d finally come up with a solution to the problem between the two ladies. “I am evil, and you’re my captive damsel in distress,” Sasha whispered, twirling an imaginary mustache.


“Oh, really? Damsel in distress, huh?” you replied in mock anger. Sasha simply turned her head, but you could see the smile on her face from the side. You quietly sat back, resigned to the fact that the bickering ladies weren’t going to be fixed by any swapping, but also enjoying the time with Sasha regardless. She could lift your mood with just a smile and knew exactly which of your buttons to push.

The manicurist finished working on your feet after you instructed her to paint your toe nails in the colours of your university and she guided you to the manicure table to work on your hands. Sasha soon joined you at the table besides yours. You two chatted quietly as the manicurist did their thing and you marveled at the reality you found yourself in. A short while later you …
