choices: You didn't realize you are way out of this place's league.
1113311113221112311112.content:
You couldn't stop looking at your hands and how clean and pristine your nails looked, not to mention the red and white colored designs that the manicurist had added at Sasha's request. You had to admit, it really didn't look too bad. The colors did well to match your outfit as well, which was an unforeseen bonus! But now you needed to decide what to do next. Sasha seemed to be leaving all the decision making up to you, despite liking to appear bossy and dominating when she teased you, she actually was giving you a surprising amount of control over the evening. It had been your idea to get your nails done after all. She was still quite a mystery to you, but you had already accepted the challenge of unraveling her.

"Hey so, you mentioned that club that Bri told us about right? I know I don't say this often, but we should, I don't know, check it out. Maybe just to see what it's all about?" You suggested, as the two of you walked back to her car.

She stopped dead before opening the door, "Did I just hear you right Billie Hopper?" She said, using your full name for effect, like a mother would. "You want to go to a club?!"

"I know it's not like me! I'm just feeling... adventurous? I don't know?" You felt the need to defend your choice suddenly.

"So who stole your body and replaced your brain with someone so fun all of a sudden?" She said, sticking out her tongue, and climbing into the driver's seat of her Fiat.

Once you were inside, you added, "Clearly a horny alien who just wanted to get in your pants. Of all the people on the planet, I chose you as my target, Earthling."

Sasha stopped mid key turn and fell on the steering wheel in laughter. "Oh, my god. Do they grow you on the cob bae? Seriously. Well Miss Alienpants, you just might complete your mission at this rate."

She winked and pulled the car out towards the club that had been suggested by Brian, apparently.

-----------------------------

Finally when they arrived, they found that they were early enough that here was a line to enter, but it wasn't all that long. You were ok with waiting, but Sasha insisted that you head to the front and try to get past. You remembered that the two of you were attractive ladies and could probably get in no problem, but you were shocked to find the bouncer very hesitant.

"I don't know ladies, I'm not so sure. There is a line for a reason..." He said, giving you a look up and down your body once over. He didn't seem to react one way or another.

Sasha pouted, seemingly annoyed at not getting in, but you saw an idea glimmer in her eyes. "Sorry Bae, I tried."

You nearly spoke to tell her it was fine, but she leaned in and gave you a deep kiss with full tongue, lasting quite a few seconds. You even felt her hand slightly working it's way up under your skirt. You felt your whole body get hot with arousal and embarrassment, but ultimately the arousal won over and you returned the kiss, giving her tongue a gentle bite as you pulled away for air. You had no idea where that came from, but you had felt it come out when she started getting so frisky, even in public. It was very much not like you...

However the bouncer stood there stunned, "Wow uhh, either you two really wanna get in that badly, or you're legit, doesn't matter. Come on inside!"

Sasha squealed and thanked the man, and quickly pulled you along by the hand as she hurried inside. You walked through a few dimly lit twisting corridors, and the dance music grew louder. Finally you found the main dance area, and it had more people than you expected for this time of day. Something seemed off about it however. Sure there were lots of people dancing, bumping hips, grinding into eachother. It was the main reason you'd never liked clubs much as a guy, it all seemed so physical and you had to get all your expression out in the open.

But despite that, this place definitely seemed different. You were used to seeing lots of girls in short skirts, shorter than what you currently wore, and platform shoes, and tons of makeup grinding against drunk frat boys who didn't even know what day of the week it was. But the people here didn't resemble that at all. The girls weren't super glitzy, but many of them were still fairly attractive. But there were many who really didn't seem to dress up at all. Some wore plaid and jeans and had messy hair. They weren't dirty looking, just, not club material as you knew it.

Then there were the men, who seemed to group up together on another side of the dance floor. Maybe none of them had the confidence to talk to those girls? They all looked like fairly attractive men however, so why on earth would they just be hanging out in a little clique?

"Ahh, let's get some drinks ok? I like this place already!" Sasha yelled over the music, and you followed her towards the bar.

She ordered you something but it was too loud to even hear what. It was surely alcohol, but sweet enough in flavor to mask it fairly well. Before you knew it, most of it was gone already, as you leaned against the bar beside your girlfriend, trying to make sense of this place.

"Hey Sash, don't look now, but we might be the best dressed girls here! Except maybe her, she's pretty cute!" You said, nodding towards a girl in a tight fitting dress on the dance floor. "Finally someone who actually fits the clubbing stereotype! Everyone else here looks like hipsters!"

Sasha burst into laughter, nearly spitting the last of her drink out. "Oh my god, seriously? You didn't figure it out?"

"Figure what out? What is it?" You asked with a nervous smile, trying to figure out what she was implying.
1113311113221112311112.title: Decided to go dancing

choices: Sasha wants to see your dance moves out on the floor.
Sasha leaves you alone for just a moment, and a girl comes up to you.
11133111132211123111121.content:
"Come on, bae! The guys dancing together, the hipster looking girls in plaid and short hair? The club is a fucking gay bar you ditz! Why else would Brian, the gay cheerleader on our team, suggest it to US, the two lesbians on the team? Holy shit and I thought I was the ditzy one in the relationship!" Sasha said, barely able to contain her laughter.

After that strong drink you were feeling a little buzzed, and found yourself laughing along with her. "I… I see it now, wow. I am really dumb aren't I?"

"Another drink for the ditzy cheerleader in training please!" Sasha yelled to the bartender. She then turned back to you, "You're not a cheerleader yet, hon, but you're definitely playing the part!"

You sighed, taking the second drink and giving it a light sip. "Come on, I haven't even tried out yet, how can you say I'm 'in training'?"

"Cause I know you'll get the spot. You've got the skill, you just need the practice now. Katie's practically begging you to try out, and you know she's got the coach's ear on who joins. She'll put in a word for you, we all will. It's basically in the bag already, now that you agreed to try out!"

"I hope so. I think it'll be good for me to get involved in something that you're so passionate about. As if we didn't spend enough time together already, right?" You teased, sticking your tongue out at her and tilting your head. A cute expression you didn't know you were capable of until now!
11133111132211123111121.title: Clearly it's a gay club!

choices: Time to sober up Sasha so she can drive you home, finally!
More shenanigans at the bar as you try to sober up.
111331111322111231111211.content:
"Oh we really don't spend enough time together, I don't know what you're talking about. Little miss tipsy over here doesn't even have the courtesy to dance with her girlfriend in a nightclub with a bunch of other lesbos watching! The least we could do is give them a nice show, let them see what they're missing out on!" Sasha teased, and put her drink down on the bar. She grabbed your hand gently, as though to shepherd you along.

You reluctantly sat your own drink down and took a look at the dance floor. There were a few girls up there dancing together, and even more guys, with both groups sort of segregated to separate sides of the dance floor. But they all looked like they were having an average amount of fun. But when Sasha dragged you over, she didn't bring you to the girl's side, or the boy's side, but the gap right in the middle. The no-man's (no-woman's) land where no one felt like dancing.

The bass from the music grew more intense, shaking your core as you stepped out into the area where everyone's eyes would be on you. As Bill you had never been a dancer, or even a clubber. Your time as Billie up to this point had just been a rollercoaster of experiences, but were ultimately on rails, guided by your ever loving Sasha. But the real test now was that everyone expected you to take charge and dance your heart out. You felt their eyes on you, judging you and Sasha for being pretty and made up in a club where half the girls were wearing jeans and flannel. You and Sasha were outsiders here, and were expected to prove yourselves.

However, the one with the highest expectations would be Sasha herself. She knew what you were capable of, even if you didn't yet. You were a practiced gymnast at the very least, and a prospective cheerleader. Dancing well was EXPECTED of you. It was about to be your job. You really hoped you had picked up on Alex's dance ability when you originally swapped with her... Your sister always was one of the best dancers on the cheer team.

"Don't sweat it hun, we're the stars of the show, remember? Feel them watching you, and use that energy! That's what a cheerleader does!" Sasha encouraged you over the pounding music, as she started to get into the rhythm.

At first you simply tried to mimic Sasha's movements, as she eased her way into a freestyle dance. You faced each other, watching her every move, and copying it one step later. When she stepped left, you mirrored her. When her butt thrust to the right, your booty was right there to answer the call. The music's pace picked up, and you really started feeling the rhythm in your bones. You didn't have time to copy Sasha anymore, but you were getting a feel for where she was going with it. Soon your shoulders were jumping, your arms were waving, and your hips were thrusting. You were too focused to notice, but Sasha was even having trouble keeping up with you at one point.

The club DJ must have seen you two and assumed there was a sort of dance duel going on, because the music suddenly mixed up. The rhythm changed, and a new bass drop kicked in when you were least expecting it. But your body was expecting it, and without a single thought, you grabbed her around the waist, pulling her hips towards your own, and rubbing your body against hers. With each beat, the two pairs of breasts bounced in unison, pressing up against each other you were dancing so close. With the aggressive and high tempo beat, the body rubbing quickly turned to grinding, almost animalistic. Your feet stood spread to either side while your torso bounced and bobbed and gyrated. Sasha closed her eyes and let you guide her body along with every movement of your own. Despite the fast pace, she managed to skillfully keep her curves hugging your body, even when she turned around and pressed her ass into your pelvis...

With her spinning around, you decided to take the dance on a more acrobatic approach, having lost all sense of self doubt halfway through the song. You spun her every which way, leading the dance in a way a man might in a couple's dance. It was true that you were taller, and formerly male yourself, but with her bossiness you had expected her to be more forward. It turned out, someone's true nature came out when expressing themselves in this way. And despite her bossy exterior, Sasha seemed perfectly fine letting you lead the charge.

Your blood was pumping, and you felt the end of the song quickly approaching. You had grabbed Sasha a few times by the waist, giving her brief lifts through the air, and she knew exactly what to do. You had seen cheerleaders lift each other before, as part of their routine, but you didn't know you actually had the upper body strength to do it mid-dance. Clearly your sister Alex had been stronger than you thought, because Sasha lifted easily... Now with the song coming to a close, you summoned all your energy and prepared for the final lift. You patted Sasha's butt, hoping she would know what you were about to do, then you dove under her skirt, and put your arms around her strong thighs. You lifted her up on your shoulders, just a few seconds before the song finished. She clung to you hard with her thighs, and she may have fallen off if she hadn't.

"Woo!!! Fuck yeah! Holy shit Bae, where have you been all my life!? I told you you had the moves for the team, now why were you holding out on us?" Sasha screamed over the noise.

Everyone on the dance floor had stopped to watch the tipsy cheerleaders doing their routine to the club music. Most everyone was cheering you on you realized. You started out nervous and unsure of yourself and these people. But now they poured their energy out for you, and you drank it all in like the water you desperately needed now after all that. The gay guys and girls at the club, they loved it, and their judgmental glares were gone.

"Wow Sasha, I don't think they're ever gonna forget that performance, huh?" You asked her as you finally set her back down on the ground, and leaned in against her for support. You were fit, but even that took a lot out of a person.

"You're damn right bae, and neither will I. I think that's enough drinks though for tonight... Only going to dehydrate us more..." Sasha helped you off the dance floor by holding your waist and letting you lean on her for support.

The crowd cheered when you gave her a peck on the cheek and plopped yourself down at a bar stool. Soon they resumed the next song, but this time you saw a lot of the dancers trying new things, and they weren't quite as segregated between guys and girls as before. If this was how it felt to do a cheer routine, then you realized, not only were you capable, but you liked it. You just hoped that wasn't the alcohol sweetening the experience.
111331111322111231111211.title: Sasha wants to see your dance moves out on the ...

1113311113221112311112111.content:
“Bae, I don’t know whether to be mad at you for holding out on me or to just love you more for being so amazing out there,” Sasha said, pointing back at the dance floor. “Oh, that’s easy,” you replied, feeling more brazen from the adrenaline rush still coursing through you, you leaned in for a more intimate kiss than the earlier one. Without the crowd all focused on you and Sasha you got to really enjoy the kiss, pulling Sasha in for and grasping her face with both hands. As the kiss ended you opened your eyes and slowly let go of Sasha, “you have no choice but to love me,” you finished, speaking close to hear ear so only she could hear you over the music.


Sasha bit her lower lip, “I need to get you all to myself, I think I already shared you enough.” Her eyes lit up as she said that and if you felt tempted to just forget the crowd was around you. It took every ounce of self-control not to follow the clear meaning spelled out in Sasha’s eyes right then and there. “You’re a terrible influence on me,” you joke, “common, I need you to sober up enough to drive us home,” you added. You were surprised at how quickly the bartender rushed over to take your order, another perk of your new self you thought. He quickly gave you two glasses of water.


You handed one to Sasha who greedily drank it down all at once, “Uh, thirsty much?” you asked. She gave you a grin, “Gotta hydrate after that show we put on … and before I find out what other moves you’ve been hiding from me when we get home.” Before you had a chance to reply you felt someone tapping you on the shoulder. When you turned around it was ….
1113311113221112311112111.title: Time to sober up Sasha so she can drive you hom...

choices: Joan lets you go after more ominous warnings.
You use your powers to get Joan to leave you alone.
11133111132211123111121112.content:
"Well well, aren't you two an adorable pair? Matching outfits, and what's this, even matching nails? She really does have you around her finger doesn't she?" A female voice asked as you started to turn around.

"Umm, excuse me, what?" You raised an eyebrow in her direction.

Before you stood a tall woman, with an an almost amazonian build. She had short hair dyed a bright blue, and a pair of black frame glasses. Her outfit was fairly small on her, and you could see she was definitely a gym rat. She towered over you, and had thighs that could crush a watermelon. She looked slightly frightening, and if it weren't for her voice you might have mistaken her for a man with dyed hair.

"I'm talking about you and Sasha. Don't fall for that shit, she's not who you think she is." The woman said with a scowl in Sasha's direction.

Sasha finally turned around, realizing you weren't following, and stopped in her tracks when she saw the woman talking to you.

"Shit... Joan? What the fuck are you doing here?" Sasha spat, rushing to your side.

The woman... Joan... chuckled, "It's a free country right, I'm here clubbing just like you. The question is, why are you here? This is a place people go to get hooked up, not to bring their prissy little girly toys to show off."

"What...?" Your eyes darted between the two of them.

"Come on Billie, let's get out of here, I think I'm quite sober now." Sasha gently grabbed your hand to usher you out.

You were hesitant and looked back at the Joan woman, annoyed at how she'd referred to you as the prissy little girl. You decided it was best to just talk to Sasha about this later, so you started following her. But you felt a strong hand grab your other arm, holding you in place. Joan wasn't finished it seemed.

"Hey get the fuck off me, alright?!" You snarled, trying to shake her grip loose. You were athletic for sure, but she was strong, like deadlifting strong.

Joan leaned down and spoke right into your face, "I'm not the one trying to hurt you little one. That girl is going to drive you insane and break your heart, count on it. She'll do far more damage than I can."

Sasha rushed in to try and get Joan off you, but you held her back, "No Sasha, I'm fine!" You said, then turned back to Joan, "Look lady, I don't know what you're talking about but I can take care of myself, now get your fucking hands off me."
11133111132211123111121112.title: Sasha’s ex (thing’s didn’t end well)

111331111322111231111211121.content:
Joan leaned down, tightening her grip on you to the point where it was painful. You fought to keep how painful her grip was; you didn’t want to give her the satisfaction of seeing you yelp. Getting close to your ear she said, “She broke my heart, she’ll break yours too, little girl. She’s a two faced bitch and you should run away from her before it’s too late,” she said, the anger in her voice barely contained. Joan shoved you back before letting go of you and Sasha caught you as you stumbled back. You looked back up at her as she helped you stand up, she looked down at you for a moment, her eyes apologetic, then she looked at Joan if looks could kill Joan would have turned to ash. Sasha stepped beside you, putting an arm around you protectively and you reached for her free hand, making it clear you were not going anywhere.

Joan looked at both of you, her muscles tense and her jawline looking so tight it might cut glass. Clearly wanting to say more, but she saw that whatever she’d intended to do hadn’t panned out. “Suit yourself, you stupid bimbo, you want to stay with that bitch, whatever, don’t say I didn’t warn,” Joan said before turning around and walking away. The moment she was out of sight you felt Sasha breathe out a sigh of relief, “Darling, I’m so very sorry about all that, had I known …” she started to say but you cut her off, “There’s no way you could have known, Sash, but let’s get outta here, I’m more than ready to go now.” You rubbed your arm when Joan had grabbed you, feeling how sore the spot was thanks to her, when you looked at it you could see the red imprint of her hand on your skin.

Sasha noticed you rubbing your arm and instantly exclaimed, “Oh my God! She really did hurt you! I am soooo sorry, Bae!” You looked at her, feeling a cocktail of emotions that you didn’t feel like dealing with in the club, “I’ll be ok, let’s just get out here quick, I just want to go home now.” Sasha’s face looked ashen as she quietly nodded and guided you out of the club.
111331111322111231111211121.title: Joan lets you go after more ominous warnings.

choices: You cheer her up by changing the subject and doing something fun.
Sasha left out part of the story about Joan...
1113311113221112311112111211.content:
Without a second of delay, the two of you headed to the car, and started heading home. Sasha insisted that she was sober, even though you weren't so sure. It was hard to tell because she seemed so rattled by what had just gone down. Joan didn't even lay a hand on her, but Sasha looked like she had seen a ghost.

A few minutes into the drive, at a stop light, she finally broke the awkward silence. She turned to you and placed her hand on your arm, "You sure you're ok? She has a strong grip, I know... Is it bruised?"

"I'll be fine Sasha... I just really want to know what that was all about." You said plainly, giving your own arm another comforting rub down.

"Well I think you can figure out the gist of it. That was my ex... things didn't end well between us, as you can see. It was a roller coaster of a relationship, but it ultimately came crashing down pretty hard in the end. I uh... I'm sorry you had to hear about it like that, I mean, it's normal people don't talk about their ex-girlfriends..."

"That's fine... just focus on driving. We can talk about it more when we're home. And I mean it, we're talking about this." You told her with a worried look.

She simply nodded, and you heard a brief sniffle. When she thought you weren't looking she quickly wiped her eye on her cardigan. You placed your hand on her leg and gave it a quick squeeze. "We'll talk about it. I know it's going to be difficult."

---------------------------------------

Finally back in the dorm, you kicked off your sandals, threw off your cardigan and flopped down onto the bed, exhausted. Your girlfriend followed suit, but just sat down quietly at the edge of the bed. You crawled towards the end of the bed and sat next to her, giving her comfort with your presence. You decided to wait for her to say something.

After a long silence, she finally started, "So… Joan's and my relationship didn't exactly end well… but it was not good for a long time. I tried to get out of it multiple times but she was just too… insistent. She was too dominating. She wasn't even always as rough and tough as she was tonight, that started towards the tail end of our relationship when she started bulking up. She spent so much time at the gym, more than you and I combined. So much time that I didn't even really see her much anymore. And then when I did see her she demanded that I spend time with her."

You let her continue, placing your hand on her back gently.

"Our time together became loveless, at least for me. She was so insistent, violently insistent at some points. Occasionally I had to hide bruises and I didn't really even tell my friends. I was just a freshman in college at the time, I didn't know what I was doing… She was a few years older than me and knew what she was doing, so I just suffered for a while." Sasha began to cry at this point, and you rubbed her shoulder blade soothingly.

Between sniffles she continued, "So one night, at a party, I slept with someone else. It had been so long since I met another girl who was interested in me, that I couldn't stop myself. It reminded me what I was missing by staying with Joan. I immediately knew I had to end it. I didn't know how to break up with someone, it had always been the other way around. I was afraid of what to say, and the fact that she had bulked up to the point of arm wrestling a gorilla, I was terrified then. That wasn't the girl I started dating. Sure she was big before, but it hadn't consumed her life. Sorry I'm rambling I just…"

You grabbed her a tissue and asked, "Is there more?"

"Yeah… Like I said I… I don't know how to break up with people, but I knew I had to do it. So I let her find out about the girl I slept with. It was probably the worst way to break up with someone in hindsight, but she blamed everything on me. The loveless relationship, the violent arguments, the fact that I never had time for HER. It was all my fault, and she ignored the bruises and other injuries she gave me, like I was exaggerating them. She never straight out hit me… but she was very very forceful. That night I called Brian, and he came to help me get all my things out of her place, and I left forever. Brian and I changed gyms in the hopes of avoiding her there too, and that's where I met Katie and you…"

You really didn't know what to say at first. So that was how you and Sasha met in this reality, you and Katie were actually friends before knowing Sasha and Brian. You wondered just how long after her breakup with Joan did she start dating you… "So, we started dating after your breakup with this woman? How long was that?"

"Billie, I know what you're wondering, and no. Our relationship is NOT a rebound or anything like that. I didn't choose you because you're my anti-Joan, I chose you because you are you. I didn't date anyone for at least a year after the breakup. If you remember, I didn't even know you were into girls until the first night we were intimate… But I was so… so happy to find you. You filled in a part of my life that no one else ever had. I realized I was looking for the wrong type of relationship all along."

Before she started to cry again, you took her in your arms and gave her a deep embrace, letting her cry her eyes out on your shoulder. You couldn't help but cry as well, it was just way too emotional. But finally you were able to say, "Well I don't care what Joan says, I think I found the right girl for me. The two of us… we're just an amazing team. Who else out there could do what we do?"

She sniffled through a smile, "No one, not a fucking one. This is the relationship I never knew I needed for many years. You know, when I first came out of the closet in high school, I was the one of the only lesbians I knew. I thought that in order to be happy with a girl, she had to be strong and dominant, because those were the only girls around who I knew liked girls. Many of them are very nice girls, but I just don't mesh with them. Joan was just the wakeup call I guess. Then an angel fell in my lap and I haven't looked back since."

Sasha pecked your cheek and rested her head on your bare shoulder. You felt a wetness on your skin as her tears ran down onto you. But you just let her continue…
1113311113221112311112111211.title: Back at home

11133111132211123111121112111.content:
The two of you sat like that for a long time, Sasha’s tears freely running down her face and onto your shoulder. You gently caressed her hair, running your fingers gently through it in a soothing motion. After some time, when you figured Sasha didn’t have more to say you said, “You know, I’m going to need my shoulder back at some point, Sash.” She chuckled, “Hey, what’s the point of having a girlfriend if you can’t steal hear shoulder for a good cry?” her tone that of mock indignation. She sniffled a bit and you laughed, “Sash, you can cry on my shoulder, but I draw the line at getting your boogers on me!”


“Now that’s just mean! You’re supposed to love me, boogers and all. Now hand me a tissue or something,” she replied, a smile fighting to coalesce on her lips. You handed her a box of paper tissues from the night stand and she blew her nose; not the sexiest sight you’d seen in your time with her, but it warmed your heart to see her smile after the maelstrom of emotions Joan had kicked up in her. “I’ll love you no matter what Sasha,” you said, meaning it wholeheartedly. Sasha looked up at you, brushing stray hairs from her face, “Even with a puffy nose, red nose, tears and snot?” she asked with a crooked smile. You both laughed and fell back on the bed, and without any reason you grabbed a pillow and knocked Sasha with it.

She looked completely surprised, “What’d you do that for?!” she asked. “I don’t know,” you shrugged, hitting her with the pillow again. “What? Are we 12?” Sasha complained, but you could see her hand reaching for a pillow as well. “You … are … so … immature!” Sasha cried out, punctuating each word by hitting you with the pillow. The two of you jumped on the bed and started hitting each other with the pillows like school girls. It was dumb and silly, but it was somehow the perfect release for all the emotions that had been brought up by Joan.
11133111132211123111121112111.title: You cheer her up by changing the subject and do...

choices: Going to class seems different now as a girl.
After class, you train at the gym for the cheer tryouts.
111331111322111231111211121112.content:
The pillow fight quickly got out of hand, through all the laughing and flailing about, and Sasha finally struck you down with a solid pillow strike to the side of the head. You came crashing down onto the bed, as though in slow motion, landing on a pile of soft blankets, laughing the whole way down. You lay there still for a moment, trying to play dead, but Sasha pounced on top of you, pressing a pillow to your belly, and squishing herself against your body.

"Oh ho, I got you now!" she said from on top of you.

You slowly opened your eyes and caught her staring at you. You stared back at her until she finally threw the pillow aside and sat up a bit, looking like an embarrassed school girl who just held hands with her crush. You smiled, "Hah, you really need to get better at staring contests."

"Not my fault I get all butterflies in my stomach still when you look at me that way... Even after all this time, I still can't believe someone as amazing as you would be this into someone like me." She sighed.

You put your hands around her waist and pulled her back on top of you. "Sasha, we have something amazing here, both of us. You have no reason to be insecure, trust me, I wonder the same thing about how a girl like you would be into me. But we shouldn't question it, just enjoy this for as long as we can. Life is too short to worry about any of this, especially when together we can do literally anything."

Sasha snorted, "Holy shit, finally my corny girl is back to normal. Just one thing I want to know?"

"What's that?"

"Why are your clothes still on...?"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------

The next morning you woke up feeling Sasha's warm naked flesh against your back, and one of her legs was laying on you as she spooned you from behind. She had one arm draped over your side as well, with the soft palm of her hand resting against your waist. You sat there and tried to go back to sleep, not wanting to disturb her. You drifted in and out of sleep several times until finally the alarm went off and you were wide awake. Sasha groaned and hugged you tighter, but when you started to get up she finally let go and rolled over.

"Wake up Sash, don't you have class today?" You asked her, throwing a pillow at the back of her head.

"Unnnngh... I dunno, maybe..." She mumbled and hugged a pillow.

"If you don't go to school, then you can't give me cheer training later... I'm gonna need some help if you want me to pass the tryouts." You teased her, as you headed into the bathroom to clean up and prepare for the day.

Just like last night, when you were able to apply your own makeup, you knew what all of the products you used in your daily routine were. You had all the knowledge needed, and you got a head start while Sasha slowly pulled herself out of bed. Seems she wasn't as much of a morning person as you were now. By the time she was awake, you had already finished your hair and makeup, just in time for her to get started on it.

"Fine fine... just give me a minute to get ready..." Sasha mumbled, still in a half asleep voice.
111331111322111231111211121112.title: The following morning

111331111322111231111211122.content:
Joan leaned down, tightening her grip on you to the point where it was painful. You fought to keep how painful her grip was; you didn’t want to give her the satisfaction of seeing you yelp. You’d been having a perfect night out with Sasha, it had been one of the most amazing nights of your life in fact and Joan had popped up just to ruin it all. You’d gone from feeling the rush from putting on a show on the dance floor to having Sasha’s ex in your face, with her hand grasping your arm painfully. “Don’t you understand, bitch? I’m the one trying to help you, you don’t know who the real Sasha is. And seriously Sasha, this is who you replace me with? Some prissy little bitch …” Joan said. “Don’t call my girlfriend a bitch you sadistic psycho!” Sasha retorted angrily. Joan let go of your arm and stepped right up to Sasha, “And what are you going to do about it, Sasha? We both know who’s gonna come out on top,” she said, emphasizing “Top”. “Joan, just leave us alone, you and I are over, we’ve been over for a long time and I’ve moved on,” Sasha said pointing at you and putting herself between Joan and you, “And you should too,” reaching her hand back to grasp yours. Joan looked like she was about to explode, barely contained rage pouring from her every pore, she clenched and un-clenched her fists, looking angrier by the second.

Sasha turned around and just gave you a look that said, “Let’s walk away.” “Don’t you turn your back to me, you bitch!” Joan screamed, grabbing Sasha by the shoulder and twisting her around, then she cocked her arm back, ready to punch Sasha. “NO!” you screamed and without really thinking you swapped Sasha’s muscle build with Joan’s. The punch landed but Joan no longer looked like the imposing woman she had been, she yelled out in pain, her fist having connected with the much stronger Sasha. “Joan, I don’t want to hurt you, but if you try that again or if you insult my girlfriend again I won’t hold back,” Sasha said with the calm that comes from being secure in being able to win. “What does she have that I don’t? We’re about the same build, I mean, what the fuck, Sasha? I didn’t dress right for you? What?” Joan asked in desperation. “Joan, you needed to stop being a psycho. Now, I’ll ask you again, please leave us alone,” Sasha replied.

Joan let out an exasperated scream and walked away, melting into the crowd. “Wow, that was … uh ...” you said, trailing off, feeling your heart pounding in your head from what had just happened. You hadn’t really figured on making Sasha more muscled, but in the moment your instinct completely took over. However, a quick look over her new body told you that you weren’t opposed to the latest version. She was definitely much bigger than she had been, but unlike Joan she didn’t look manly. Her feminine style of dress had adjusted to her larger proportions and her face had simply become slightly sharper without losing its beauty. Her had changed to a more striking mane of hair, perhaps to highlight her femenity a bit more.

She closed the gap between you and held you close to her; you could feel the finely sculpted muscles of her arms around you. You felt absolutely safe in her embrace, it wasn’t until that moment that you’d noticed that the whole thing had rattled you enough that you’d been shaking slightly. Sasha didn’t say anything, she simply held you for a moment and you slowly calmed down and your breathing came back to normal. “I’m so sorry that happened, Joan was … she was obsessed with me, it was just a toxic relationship, I’m sorry that she came at you like that, but I’ll never let anyone insult you, let alone hurt you, Bae, you know that, right?” Sasha said into your ear. “I know, I just … let’s go home,” you replied. Part of you was exhausted after the incredible day you’d had, but another part of you was curious about Sasha’s new curves and edges.
111331111322111231111211122.title: You use your powers to get Joan to leave you al...

choices: Billie makes herself and sasha big stars
111331111322111231111212.content:
"Really they are all gay? Wow, I wouldn't have known." After a while of looking around and drinking many beers, Billie starts to get conscious of his own somewhat still masculine looks. They left the club and went to another place. Pretty soon they got very drunk and started to feel sorry for themselves.

So Sasha and Billie were down at the New Amsterdam, staring at that yellow haired girl.

Billie strikes up a conversation, with this black-haired flamengo dancer (named Maria). "You know I dance while my father plays guitar." Maria is suddenly beautiful.

Billie thinks, "We all want something beautiful, Man I wish I was beautiful." So come dance this silence down in the morning. Following with the music Billie sings, "Shalalalalala Yeah. Uh huh... Yeah. Cut up, Maria. Show me some of those Spanish dances! Pass me a bottle, Sasha."

Starting to feel a bit drunk Billie tells Sasha "Believe in me. Help me believe in anything. Cause I want to be someone who believes, who believes, who believes, who believes."

Sasha and Billie tell each other fairy tails and they stare at the beautiful women.

"She's looking at you. Ah no, no, she is looking at me," Sasha corrects Billie. Smiling in the bright lights, coming through in stereo. "When everybody loves you, you can never be lonely," Sasha reminds Billie.

"I will paint my picture. I will paint my nails in blue and red and black and gray. All of the beautiful colors are very very meaningful...Well you know, gray is my favorite color."

"I felt so symbolic yesterday. If I knew 'Picasso,' (Picasso is the nickname of the best cheerleader from a different school) I would buy a gray leotard and play," Sasha confides.

Sasha and Billie look into the future, stare at the beautiful women. "She's looking at you," Sasha said.

"I don't think so, she's looking at me." Standing in the spotlight, Sasha got herself a gray leotard and started to dance. "When everybody loves me, I will never be lonely..."

"I want to be a lion. Everyone wants to pass as cats," Billie says expressing a random thought from her drunk mind.

"We want to be big, big stars," yeah but Billie has different reasons for that. (then to sasha Billie says again) "Sasha, believe in me, I don't believe in anything...And I want to be someone to believe, to believe to believe."

Sasha and Billie stumbling through the barrio...they stare at the beautiful women. "She's perfect for you, man; But you are perfect for me."

"I want to be Bob Dylan," Billie blurts out. Sasha wishs she was someone just a little more funky...

"When everybody loves you, that is just about as funky as you can be."

(Back at home) Sasha and Billie staring at the video. "When I look at the television. I want to see me staring right back at me."

"We all wanna be big stars," but we don't know why and we don't know how.

"When everybody loves me, I'm gonna be just as happy as I can be. Sasha you and me, we are going to be big stars. I promise." With Billie's powers that might happen.
111331111322111231111212.title: Sasha leaves you alone for just a moment, and a...

choices: Stick to being the taller one
111331111322111231112.content:
You looked around for an idea to fix the situation with your two loud, rude and obnoxious neighbors. They were messing with not just your mood, but Sasha’s as well and that bothered you most of all. The main idea behind the mani-pedis was to enjoy something relaxing and fun with Sasha and the women’s bickering was completely ruining that. Although in reality Sasha had been your girlfriend for less than a day, the connection between felt much older, and you wanted to see her happy, to do things together that you both would find enjoyable. You didn’t have every memory from your whole life with her, but you know it was something meaningful, that she also cared for you even if she could be brusque at times. You had glimpses of little things she did to make you happy too and how attentive she was to listening to you if you were felling down. Just like earlier when she noted she’d noted she’s made you feel uncomfortable, she could read your emotions and would instantly apologize if she hurt you. She could be bossy, but she was always caring and thoughtful.


You knew from her point of view this was just one of the many mani-pedis you’d both had together, but for you it was the first, in spite of memories to the contrary, and it irritated you that the rude women were tarnishing the experience. You looked around for two woman who’s height you could swap with the loud women next to you, but then you had a thought. What if you swapped their height with Sasha’s and yours? There were two possibilities there, one of you would be the markedly taller one while the other one would be unmistakably shorter.


Being that you were currently the taller one of the two and having been a guy before you felt inclined to keep things somewhat close to how they already were and not change the dynamics of your relationship too much. However, you were a bit curious to see what it might be like to be the shorter one in the relationship and have Sasha tower over you.

After some thought you decided to …
111331111322111231112.title: Involve yourself or Sasha in a swap, or both?

choices: The two of you get dinner at a nice restaurant.
You decide to make one last swap before leaving the nail salon.
1113311113221112311122.content:
You couldn't shake the curiosity of what it was like to be so short. The lady who was complaining about it was incredibly cute, not just due to her size, but it certainly played a part. She wasn't even 5 feet tall, so even small curves on her were exaggerated to attractive proportions. You knew you only had B cup breasts, but you wondered just how much bigger that would look on a much smaller body-frame.

Without giving it any more thought, you swapped your height with the short woman, suddenly feeling your body shift positions in the salon chair. You were now slouched much further down in the chair just so your feet could reach the basin to soak in. You looked at the rest of your body, and it seemed more or less the same, just... tiny. Your fingers were slightly shorter but slender as well, as your whole skeleton had shrunk. Your muscles however hadn't really changed much, and you still felt just as fit as before. They were not overly prominent, since with your much reduced weight due to height, you didn't need big muscles to throw your own weight around in workouts. You had the core strength of a gymnast and acrobat, and the petite body to match, except the breasts and butt were a bit out of place... Your breasts had basically stayed the same weight and volume, but on your compact torso they seemed to balloon out from a B to at least a C. You knew that with a smaller torso it made your whole band size shrink, therefore exaggerating the size of your breasts, without changing them one bit!

You couldn't really get a good comparison of how much shorter you were than Sasha while sitting down in the chair, so you simply had to wait for the manicure to end. The women were now bickering, but with their heights closer than before, they had moved on to something else to bicker about. You decided not to swap Sasha for now, since you just weren't sure how drastically this would affect your relationship. She was at least 6 inches taller than you now, and swapping her with the taller girl would bring that up to 20 inches taller! That would just not work out... You wouldn't even be able to kiss each other!

Finally the manicure was finished, and they had painted on the school colors of your university onto your nails, which you decided looked quite nice and full of school spirit. Finally getting to step out of the chair onto the floor was quite a trip. You expected your feet to reach the ground much sooner, and you nearly had to hop down out of the chair to land cleanly. Standing on your bare feet, you felt like a child, with everything towering over you, including your girlfriend. She looked down at you and smiled, putting her arm around the small of your back.

"You look lost like a deer in headlights, hun. What's wrong?" She asked, sounding a bit more protective and worried for you than usual.

"Hmm? Oh nothing, just a bit disoriented is all! What do you think of these colors, are they cheery enough for the team?" You held out the backs of your hands to her, showing off the designs they put on.

"It's perfect, doll! I think you'll fit in just fine! But you sure you don't need like a glass of water or something? I know we spent a while in those chairs, you're not dizzy are you?" She continued to worry... it was actually rather cute how much she cared, you thought.

"No really, I'm fine! But uhh, I don't think I'm up for clubbing tonight, how about we just get a bite to eat?"

"Sounds lovely, I'm a bit hungry myself. Don't forget your shoes by the way!" She teased, letting go of you and pointing towards the pair of heels on the ground.

You stood there confused for a second... those weren't the shoes you'd picked out before leaving. You didn't even consider they might be yours. They were a similar style, but the heel was much higher, and they even had a thick platform on the bottom! These sandals would easily boost your height by 5 inches at least, and the thought of wobbling around in them was a little scary actually. You stepped into them, and felt how perfectly the arch molded to your foot. Once you fixed the straps around your ankles, they seemed very secure and you were sure they wouldn't slip. If they hadn't fit just perfectly you worried that you would fall right on your face after one step!

With the heels secured to your feet, you slowly stood up, and realized that with your new height and body type, you felt just fine balancing. You had the grace of a cat it would seem, and it was far easier than you expected. When you looked up to see just how you compared to Sasha now, you were much closer to her eye level, but you noticed she was already wearing her own shoes, which had reduced in height compared to earlier. She now only had a 2 inch heel on hers, bringing her to about 3 inches taller than you when both in your heels. It was a small enough difference where you could still easily kiss, and that was all that mattered. You leaned forward to peck her lips, having to crane your neck a bit, but it was ok.

"I think I'm ready to go!" You told her with a more cheerful demeanor than your usual self.

"That's my little bae, come on, let's go." She kissed your forehead in return, not wanting to lean over at the moment.

As you walked out, you quickly got used to the towering heels, and were rather grateful that you had them, so you felt at least somewhat on Sasha's level. You had to take smaller steps than before, but the way it moved your hips seemed to almost entrance your girlfriend when she looked now and then. But you noticed the way she liked to keep her arm around you or your waist, or just holding hands with you, was much more.... protective than before. The height difference had definitely changed the dynamic of the relationship. If she had been a little bit dominating and bossy before, now she was almost like a dominant big sister (with benefits?), while you felt small and wanting protection. You hadn't necessarily become more submissive, but by nature of your height difference, that part of you was brought out much more, especially around Sasha.
1113311113221112311122.title: Try being the shorter one

11133111132211123111222.content:
There was something you thoroughly enjoyed about how protective Sasha seemed to be towards you with this latest swap. It wasn’t a night and day sort of shift, but there was something about the way she moved and held on to you. The two of you approached the front desk to pay and she hung back behind you a little bit. You heard her rummaging through her purse, so you figured she was just looking for her keys, but then you noticed in the large mirror behind the front desk that Sasha was completely captivated by the movement of your hips and had stopped looking through her purse mid-way. When she noticed that you’d caught her she blushed and smiled like a kid caught with their hand in the cookie jar. You smiled at her, loving that you’d caught her red handed, but also loving her attention. You turned around, ready to give her a snappy comment, but before you could get the first word out Sasha leaned in and stole a kiss from you, you tried to protest, but she kissed you again and did it again when you tried to speak one last time. You looked at her in mock anger and she simply stuck her tongue out at you.


You wanted to be mad at her for taking advantage of her height so unashamedly, but you enjoyed her kisses too much for that. You just pouted up at her as she smiled, feeling satisfied that she’d dealt with any comment you’d wanted to make. “Since I mentioned coming here in the first place I think it’s only fair that I pay for it,” Sasha said, giving you another kiss and stepping over to speak to the attendant at the counter. You felt tempted to protest if for nothing else to get another kiss from her, but decided to enjoy being treated by a girlfriend for the first time would be nice. Although you had the impression that in this latest version of reality Sasha liked to pay for things and take care of you a bit more than before the last swap.


Thinking about the last swap made you wonder if there was any other swap at the salon to be made. There was the attendant behind the front desk, she was a short Asian woman, about your new height, with an impeccably made up face, and gorgeous, almond shaped eyes. A young, Latin woman getting her hair done also caught your attention, she looked like she’d stepped out of a Telenovela, with flawless tanned skin and exotic features. You also noticed a few other women with interesting features around the salon who would also be fun to swap with.
11133111132211123111222.title: You decide to make one last swap before leaving...

choices: You decide to undo these changes, it's too weird seeing a new face!
You decide to fully commit to this, after seeing how Sasha likes it.
111331111322111231112221.content:
Ever since you saw how differently Sasha was treating you as a short girl, your curiosity was sparked to see just how far you could take this. The short Asian attendant caught your eye, since you and her had very similar body types now. But the lady had impeccable makeup, far exceeding your own self taught makeup style. But it wasn't just her makeup that caught your eye, but her entire face. You suspected she was Thai, and had the perfect oval eyes and soft facial structure that really suited her makeup style.

First thing you did was swap makeup knowledge. She went from looking incredibly sharp and well put together, to being a little less made up thanks to your style. When you looked in the mirror behind the counter, you saw your own face, with her makeup applied to it. The eye makeup looked nice... but there was just something off about it. The way your eyes were shaped, the eyeliner just came to too much of a point on the edge and didn't have the same impact as it did on her face.

You knew what had to be done, and you would at least give it a try. You held your breath and told yourself that if it looked weird or something bad happened, that you would change it back immediately. You closed your eyes and focused on swapping ethnicities with the Thai girl. You felt a tingle around your face and skin, but you didn't get any taller or shorter. When you slowly peeked one eye open, you were amazed... You hardly recognized yourself, now a Thai girl with black hair styled the same as before, and a creamier skin tone. But more importantly was your face was quite different. Your eyes were rounder and more oval shaped, and the makeup style worked wonders on it, giving you adorable big looking eyes, and glossy kissable lips.

A part of you suddenly recalled that Asians sometimes used special makeup formulas, designed to work better with their slightly different skin chemistry. That explained why it looked a little wrong before, but also your new facial structure was what really brought it all together. Your face didn't look like a carbon copy of the attendant at the desk however, but it didn't look like yours either. And her new face didn't look like yours either, it was almost like she looked like herself if she had been born to white parents, and you looked like yourself if you had been born to Asian parents. You had different genetics now, but they were mixed with your own.

Finally Sasha was done paying, and she turned around to give you another sneaky kiss before saying, "Are we finally ready to leave gorgeous?"

You couldn't help but smile at her, but then you caught another sight of yourself in the mirror... You were very pretty, but you still weren't quite sure if it was the right thing to do. Who knows how being a new race could have affected reality with your family as well...
111331111322111231112221.title: Swap with the Asian woman

choices: You introduce Sasha to new foods.
On the way to the restaurant...
1113311113221112311122212.content:
But you decided that it was worth it. If you were going to be a new person, you were going all the way. You already looked entirely different, and you were absolutely in love with your new face, and clearly Sasha was too, though she thought this was normal. The last thing you needed to become the new you, was a new name. You were tired of 'Billie', being a feminized form of your old name, and wanted to distance yourself from that identity as much as possible. You looked at the nametag of the formerly Asian attendant, and her name hadn't changed after the swap, it still read "Nicole". Clearly an Americanized woman, it was a nice name, and didn't remind you of Bill in any conceivable way. So you swapped it, and suddenly her nametag read "Billie".

A sudden disorientation fell over your mind as every memory of yourself being named Bill or Billie, was wiped clean from your mind. You were now Nicole, and sometimes your friends called you Nikki. You were left with the memory that once your name was Bill, and you had swapped it, but that was it. In every other respect you felt that you were Nicole at your very core. You were Nicole, a very short 4'10" 21 year old girl of Thai descent, who adopted at a very young age by an American family, and raised by your parents. You knew it didn't used to be like that, but you didn't care, these swaps had all been of your own free will. You were glad to still have memories of your parents, and sister Alex, as they seemed mostly unaffected by the swap. The only difference being that you were adopted.

"C'mon bae, let's go to that Thai restaurant you're always raving about, I promise this time I'll try something adventurous!" Sasha teased, as the two of you finally left the nail salon.

"Sasha?" You asked on the walk back to the car.

"What's that bae?"

"Why do you always call me bae, is my name, weird or something?" You asked, feeling suddenly insecure about your choice to swap names...

"Nikki... you know I like your name! It's a perfectly normal name, Nicole is very cute. I just call you bae cause that's ... I dunno, it's just part of my vocabulary I guess. I call someone that if they're incredibly special to me, someone who is my number one. You're my bae, no matter what your name is."

You giggled at how sweet she was being, "You are way too kind you know that? It's a silly word, and don't expect me use it, but if that's what it means, then by all means, I'll be your bae. God it sounds so stupid when I say it!"

The two of you laughed at the ridiculousness of the weird slang word, and you both felt better at acknowledging how silly the whole thing was. You were comfortable you could live like this for a long time, it was good. But first you were starving, and the mention of Thai food was suddenly all you could think about!
1113311113221112311122212.title: You decide to fully commit to this, after seein...

choices: Stay as you are for now
11133111132211123111222121.content:
The drive to the Thai place was pleasant and really enjoyed how easy it was to talk with Sasha, the two of you just seemed to click with each other. In essence you’d jumped over the beginning part of a relationship, where both people are trying to get feel for the other, and landed in the fun part where both partners have the other’s rhythm down pat. You didn’t feel like Sasha was someone you’d just met at all, you felt the sort of connection that comes from a deep and meaningful connection to one another. You were almost surprised when Sasha parked, “Wow, we’re there already?” you asked, looking around, having gotten completely lost in the conversation that the drive just flew by. Sasha giggled, “Yes, silly, we’re here and I’m in serious need of … uh … what was that soup? Pha? Pho?”

“It’s pronounced Fa, but it’s spelled P-H-O!” you told her in mock frustration, “And you said you were going to try something adventurous this time! You already had pho, it’s not Adventurous if you’ve had it before!” you chided her and she looked at you with a heartbreaking pout. “But I wanted Pha… Pho … whatever it’s called, it’s delicious,” Sasha replied, doing her best impression of child throwing a temper tantrum. You laughed as she crossed her arms and harrumphed, “Fine you can have pho,” you told and she perked up like a happy puppy, you could almost see her imaginary tail wagging, “But you have to try something else as well,” you finished. She looked at you as though she were giving your proposal deep thought, then she smiled brightly and replied, “I can work with that,” and before you could say anything she got out of the car, rushed over to your side and opened the door for you, extending her hand to help you get out. With your new height you were grateful that Sasha’s car was a small Fiat, otherwise you might have felt a bit embarrassed having to hop out of a car. “And here I thought chivalry was dead,” you said with smile and Sasha simply looked at you with a self-satisfied grin.

It was a short walk from the car to the restaurant, when you got to the entrance Sasha made a show of opening the door for you and said, “Ladies first,” with another, even bigger grin. The two of you laughed, enjoying Sasha’s act of the dutiful boyfriend. The hostess smiled when she saw you enter, instantly greeting you in Thai. You gave tried to reply in Thai, “Sa-wat-dee Kah” sounding out each syllable, giving her an apologetic smile and shrug. The hostess’ smile faltered, understanding that in spite of your appearance you didn’t speak the language. “Party of two?” the hostess asked in a soft, yet recognizable accent. “Yes, two. Thank you,” Sasha replied, stepping in when she noticed you felt a bit uncomfortable. In this latest reality you’d been adopted very early from Thailand and hadn’t really picked up the language, you had memories of trying to learn about the culture you came from, but what you knew was very limited. Sasha knew Thai food was one of the things that made you feel a bit connected to your roots, but she also knew it also got you down at times to think about the disconnect.

Shaking off the awkward moment you smiled as Sasha pulled out the chair for you, “You know you don’t have to do that, Sash.” “I know I don’t Have to, but I Like to. It’s fun being your knight in shining armor from time to time,” she replied with a toothy smile. “Oh? Would that make me your damsel in distress?” you asked raising an eyebrow. “Well if the shoe fits on those tiny feet of yours …” she replied, trailing off and giving you a wink. “Oh really? We’ll see who’s the damsel in distress when we get back to the gym. I might be small, but I can run circles around you!” you told her, completely unable to keep from laughing.

The waitress came by and you ordered pho, lad na and pla rad prik. Sasha looked at you apprehensively once the waitress was gone. “Oh, don’t worry, you’ll like these dishes, they’re nothing really all that exotic, trust me,” you said before she could raise an objection. The two of you again got lost in conversation, joking and enjoying the moment. Once the food arrived Sasha was taken aback by the fact that one of the dishes entailed a whole fish, head and all. “Common, you said you’d try something adventurous, where is my knight in shining armor?” you said a bit tauntingly. Sasha finally tried the fish and was surprised that she enjoyed the sweet and sour taste, “It’s got a bit of a kick,” she commented, taking a quick gulp of her drink.

Out of the corner of your eye you noticed a pair of waitresses pointing in your direction and laughing. You wished you could understand what they were saying, and you felt a bit sad that you didn’t speak Thai. Logically you knew that you’d been Caucasian just a short while before, and that your memories as an adopted child from another country were all part of the swap, but they felt as real as any other memories you’d gained. You toyed with doing another swap to get a bit closer to your Thai roots, but you also thought it might be something you could live with.

After a moment you decide to …
11133111132211123111222121.title: You introduce Sasha to new foods.

choices: Turns out that hostess knew more than just two languages, and now you do too.
Sasha is just exaggerating to flatter you.
111331111322111231112221211.content:
You had already changed nearly everything about you, your gender, your fashion, your height, and even your ethnicity and name. You were in deep, and there was no turning back now, you had committed. You remembered the hostess at the front of the restaurant, and how nice her English was, despite her obvious accent. She had a lovely voice, and when you heard her speaking Thai to her coworkers, it was obvious that she was completely fluent in the language. You decided it was time to switch voice and language with the hostess.

At first, you felt no different, except a few new memories had begun to appear, memories of growing up very young and learning two languages. As you thought of it, you realized you were actually thinking in Thai. A second later, when you looked at Sasha, you started to switch over to thinking in English again. It was a strange sensation, but one that happened seamlessly. Looking at Sasha, you saw her going back to her pho soup, cleansing her palette after trying the fish.

"You know Sasha, pho is actually a Vietnamese food, right?" You asked, noticing how different your new voice sounded. It was slightly higher in pitch, but also more melodic in the way your accent lilted through the words.

"Then how come they serve it here, and it's so good?!" She looked almost incredulous, stopping a spoonful of soup right before it reached her mouth.

You found yourself... giggling. Actually really giggling, and it felt fun to do. "Cause! This is a Thai restaurant in America, they serve some Chinese and Vietnamese dishes here because they know half the customers don't know the difference, and people always request it. I mean you're a perfect example. A silly American girl who comes here just for the pho, which isn't even Thai food. But they got your business didn't they?"

You found yourself having to work a little harder at speaking English than before, but after a few seconds it started to flow naturally again, while you were thinking in English. You were also glad that your new accent only got in the way ever so slightly. There were new memories popping up about how you worked so hard as a teenager to try and get rid of your accent completely, but it never truly went away.

Meanwhile Sasha had shrugged, and just resumed eating her bowl of pho. Clearly she didn't care what country it came from, as long as it was good. And it was good! A short time later, the waitress came by to refill your drinks, and you asked her, "Can we get the check please? All together?" But without even thinking of it, you had asked in Thai, and the waitress smiled and said it would be right out.

Sasha looked at you a bit confused but also impressed, "You don't have to show off in front of me, you know? I know you can speak a ton of languages. But I guess we get better service when they know you're one of them. They always treat us nice when you're the one ordering."

You looked at her with a raised eyebrow, "What do you mean a ton of languages?"
111331111322111231112221211.title: Make a swap

choices: Bill gives back what he took from Bri
Bill makes an excuse to leave, but what he saw bothers him
1113311113221112312.content:
"We have an hour before the appointment. Let's tell Bri and Katie the good news," Bill said.

"Sure," Sasha and Bill went to Bri's house first. Bill knocked on the door and Bri opened it. But Bill didn't expect what he saw. Bri was dressed in oversized sweatpants and a wife beater t-shirt. he didn't have on any makeup and a hint of five o'clock shadow could be seen. This shocked Bill. He had expected to see Bri as he had left her. But when he got home, with all his fashion sense gone, he cleaned off her makeup. He would no longer wear makeup of any kind. Then put on clothes that made the new him comfortable. Finally after several hours, slight stubble had grown.

Bill felt guilty, he had taken so much from Bri, not just her now his fashion sense, but her gender too.

"Hey, guys what are you doing here?" Bri inquired.

"We have great news," Bill said without the enthusiasm he had before. "I am going to join the cheer squad."

"That is great!"

Bill was conflicted. Bri had lost so much, but Bill didn't want to give up what he had gained.

What happens next?
1113311113221112312.title: Something happens along the way.

1113311113222.content:
Bill felt lucky to have a girl like Sasha interested in him. He didn't know how long he would keep it up since this was fun but he certainly didn't want to be a woman the rest of his life. Although if Bill was going to be a woman, he didn't mind being a lesbian. But with all that in mind, he decided to go where ever Sasha led him. Bill found himself at Sasha's home.

Once alone, "Bae," she said, "you have to join the cheer squad."

"I thought we just discussed this. I'm not much of a joiner."

"I know, but Bri is awful. He just can't cheer. The only reason he is on the team is because Katie likes him."

"No, that can't be true."

"It is. Katie loves the queer. But you can't blame her. Katie couldn't get a real man with a net."

"I think Katie is very nice."

"Yes she has a nice personality as they say. But her nose is too big and her eyes are too close together. She can hardly cheer herself."

"I thought Katie was your friend."

"She is my friend, but she can barely cheer better than Bri. I think she wants him on the team so that she will seem better. And do you want me to tell you a secret?"

"What?"

"I hear that Bri's mother who is a big wig on the PTA was the one who changed the rule to get Bri on the cheer squad."

"I thought you said it was Katie."

"It is. I mean it's both of them. But if you try-out they'll have to take you over Bri and she'll be thrown off the squad. You have to join. I need you there. All the other girls are just so mean." Sasha went on to trash what seemed like everyone she knew. But before she finished, everyone was called to dinner.

At dinner Bill met the rest of Sasha's family. Her father, Andrew was a big strong brute of a man. His body was covered with thick hair. The only place he didn't have hair was on the top of his head. Sasha's mom, Lucie was sort of the opposite. She was a small woman, except she had the longest legs he had ever seen. She knew her legs were her best feature and she would wear very short skirts and high heels to highlight her legs. Sasha had one ten year old brother Alan. Alan took after his father and was big for his age.

As Sasha's girl friend Bill were treated like one of the family. They didn't have any pretenses in front of him like they would with other people. "Andy," Lucie started, "the principal at Al's school called me."

"What did that little wimp say this time?" Andrew said with a sneer.

"He said that Al is treating the other kid's badly." Lucie said. What Alan did was much worse, but Lucie minimizes anything that concerns the bad behavior of her children.

"I didn't do nothing. The kids just couldn't take a joke," Alan said defending himself.

Alan explained what he had done and Bill found what he said horrific. No one got hurt, but Bill couldn't imagine doing such a thing. But Andrew said, "Is that all? The principal bothered us about that? Doesn't he have better things to do? One of the parents must have complained. He is such a wimp, he should stand up to them."

Bill listened to everything. The whole family just weren't nice people. The men bullied everyone and the women loved to spread rumors and stab their friends and other's in the back.
