1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
After her father's shocking reveal that 'he' had breast cancer, Alisha was more than willing to postpone the wedding to make sure Mark was going to be ok. She said it was fine if she had a little baby bump since most people would have to find out sooner or later, and two months pregnant wasn't hard to hide at all. A few days later, Mark was going in for her mastectomy. You discovered that in this reality, Mark identified as a woman due to all the feminine swaps you'd given him, similar to yourself. So 'she' preferred when people used feminine pronouns to refer to her.

The mastectomy itself was a long procedure, taking several hours. You and Alisha and her mother were there to support Mark, but you were not allowed in the operating room. It was killing you to just sit around and wait to see if your future father-in-law would be ok. Alisha and her mother were both very on edge, trying to talk about anything to avoid thinking about the surgery.

I have to do something… If I can't use a swap to fix Mark's situation, then I might at least be able to comfort him. You thought to yourself.

You walked over to the door to the operating room and saw two nurses putting on their face masks to go in and assist the surgeon for the next step. You considered swapping your job with one of them, and becoming a nurse, this way you could do your best to help out in the surgery. On the other hand, there was a third girl with them who didn't look like she was dressed to be a registered nurse, but looked like she was a volunteer aid to help the patients during their recovery.

Swapping with a nurse would be risky, it would require changing your entire school history to years of nursing school in order to qualify for the job, and you would once again lose all of your knowledge of engineering. But maybe there was a way to get this nurse's job without changing your current school major?
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: You swap jobs with the nurses assistant at the ...

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
Seeing the nurse's aide, you decided to swap jobs with her. She was a volunteer so it would deplete your funds a bit, but you'll work something out later. Maybe you could get your old stylist job 'back' to make ends meet when this was all over.

You concentrated and before you knew it, you weren't only dressed differently (you were dressed as a hospital employee which included a nametag.) but you were in a different room. You weren't in the hall anymore you were in the room outside the OR. Standing next to you was Kathy and Andrea, two nurses that you now knew very well.

"How is it going?" you asked them.

"The hard part is over. The oncologist is finishing up and we will go in with the plastic surgeon to put in the implants. There is nothing to worry about," said Andrea

"That is great, I'll tell the family." Then you came out to talk to Alisha and her mother. They knew things were going well since you had a smile on your face. "He'll be fine," you told them.

Both Alisha and her mom, hugged you in relief. "When will he be through?"

"The hard part is over, the plastic surgeon is going in to finish up." Then with a smile you quipped, "You know I can tell them to cut off his willie and make him a complete woman. He is under anyway, it's no big deal, just a little snip snip and done."

"Oh, you," Alisha said returning your smile. "that is why I love you so much, you are just like dad."

"Yeah, I guess we are allot alike. He'll be in recovery in about an hour and I'll help him there. You should be allowed to see him in about two hours. Then he'll need his rest."

"OK, what should we do in the meantime?"

"Oh get something to eat, its been a long day."

"Are you coming with us?"

"I can't I have other patients besides Mark."

You then returned to the pre-OP area and got to work with your other chores. You thought to yourself, "you know I used to hate blood, but now it doesn't bother me at all."
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Swap with the volunteer aid, you'll have to...

choices: Attempt to swap the Leukemia to the boy's mother, she has better chances.
Swap the age, gender, and family relationship of the mother and son.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
With your new job as a volunteer hospital assistant, you were called in to help comfort one of the relatives of another patient. You knew this was probably the hardest part of your job now. Even though you'd only had this job for about 10 minutes, you had the memories of volunteering here for over a year while you focused on school.

While you waited for Mark's reconstruction surgery to finish, you needed to handle this young woman who was bawling her eyes out next to a young boy in a hospital bed. You sat next to her and introduced yourself.

"Hi, you're Jacob's mother, Ms Nelson right?" You said in a soft and comforting voice that you never knew you had. Apparently working this job had taught you good bedside manner as well.

She sniffled and wiped some tears, "Yes that's right. Is there any news about him?" She asked as she looked up and saw your nametag meaning you worked at the hospital.

"I'm sorry, there hasn't been any changes, I wanted to see if you were ok, if there was anything I could do for you? I'm just a volunteer, but… I'm here to help." You asked, putting your hand on hers.

"Not unless you could cure my boy… It just isn't right for a boy his age to get cancer. The doctors said… chemotherapy would likely kill him at this stage. He's too young and his body just can't take the punishment." She explained as the tears began to flow again.

You patted the young woman on the back and tried to do whatever you could to comfort her. She looked barely older than you, but she was a mother of a young toddler with leukemia, and he was her first and only child. The boy's father looked nowhere to be found, but you didn't want to judge. It was possible he was just busy right now, but you suspected she was a single parent.

"It's something no boy, or his mother, should ever have to go through. I can only imagine how hard this is for you…" You said, being reminded that in less than 6 months you would have a child of your own to worry about. You tried not to think of things like what you saw in this hospital, where some children had terminal illnesses, but maybe you could help them. You weren't an expert on cancer treatments, but you suddenly got an idea.

"Ma'am I know this is going to sound… morbid. So please forgive me asking, but… if you had a chance to save your son by taking his cancer into yourself, would you do it? It's a complete hypothetical of course, but these kinds of questions help the healing process." You lied about the last bit, but you needed to make sure she was willing.

The young woman looked at you with tears still falling, not really registering what you were saying at first. "Y-yes of course I would! I would die for my son if I had to. I know such a thing isn't possible but if it was, I would do anything to let him live a healthy life."

"Please excuse me ma'am, I'm going to be back shortly." You assured the young mother with a smile and a gentle touch on the arm.

You left the room and looked around for someone you now knew. You needed someone more knowledgeable about cancer patients than yourself. You spotted a nurse named Natalie, which you apparently now had memories of working alongside. It was strange to suddenly get memories of things you never remembered happening, but you knew her name as soon as you saw her face.

"Hey Natalie.… I have a question." You said, and then quietly asked. "You've dealt with leukemia patients before right? What are the odds of someone say, my age, surviving chemotherapy for leukemia? Imagine I was perfectly healthy now, and then developed leukemia, how would I fare with the treatment?"

Natalie stared at you oddly for a moment as she thought, "Well, the chances are pretty good actually. If it was someone in their prime and healthy, they should be able to survive it with some effort and determination. It's never painless but… wait you're talking about that Jacob kid right? Yeah… a kid his age is very unlucky. So sad… I wish there was something we could do. If he was only older he might have been able to make it… And the poor mother!"

You looked at your wristwatch, and saw that Mark's surgery would be done soon, but you still had time to help Jacob and his mother.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: You handle a distraught relative

choices: Mrs. Nelson decided to speak up
Mrs. Nelson decided act like a baby until Jason was healthy
Mrs. Nelson decided to do nothing.  You discover your mistake.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
You returned to the room where Mrs. Nelson was staying. "Mrs. Nelson," you said, "why don't you accompany me to the chapel and you can pray for strength for you and your boy."

Mrs. Nelson thought this was a good idea and let you lead her way. Soon you were in the chapel and you encouraged Mrs. Nelson sit and start praying. You didn't have much time yourself so you made a quick swap to give Jason his mother's strength to fight the disease. But you were in a hurry and didn't realize what you had done as you left the room.

Mrs. Nelson was sitting and praying with all her heart that her son would recover. She thought she would give anything to save him. Then her perspective changed. She wasn't staring at the alter in the chapel anymore. She was suddenly in someone's arms, more than just in someone's arms, she was enveloped in someone's arm from her head which was resting on someone's forearm to her toes which were inside the other forearm.

Looking of at the face, she saw the gigantic face of her sister. Then it occurred to her, her sister wasn't gigantic, she herself was very small. She was about to say something but she found something in her mouth. She realized it was a pacifier. Before she could spit it out and say something. But her sister noticing shushed her.

Dr. Gilbert entered the room and addressed Mrs. Nelson's sister who was holding a toddler in her arms trying to comfort the baby. "How is my sister," Madeline Harper (sister of Mrs. Nelson) said.

"Well she is responding well to the chemo," Dr. Gilbert said gravely, "I think she'll recover from that. But..." Madeline knew that the word 'But' meant there was a big problem although her sister surviving cancer was her main concern. Continuing Dr. Gilbert said, "...the fight took allot out of her. She seems to have regressed mentally."

"Regressed mentally, what do you mean?"

"I mean, she is acting like a toddler, probably no older than your nephew. We had to put her into diapers. She has had a psyche workup and they say she acts like a two year old."

"Like a two year old?"

"Yes, she is no longer competent to make decisions. We can take care of her for now, but you have to go to family court and get a temporary guardianship for her. Maybe she'll come out of it, but someone has to make the decisions for her. Especially after we release her."

"Release her??? But she's like a baby."

"Yes, but we aren't equipped to handle her here. She needs chemo every week, but we have other patients who'll need her bed. Besides we think she'll do better at home. That might spark some memories."

"I don't know what to do?"

"I'll have a social worker see you. They can help you find a lawyer, or you can find one yourself." After a few more questions, Dr. Nelson left the room.

Mrs. Nelson, laying in Madeline's arms heard and understood everything. She prayed for a miracle. She wanted to give her baby the strength to fight cancer and god had answered her prayers, or so she thought. She reasoned that god had given her baby her strong body and left her with her baby's body. At least she assumed that she was in Jacob's body, she had no way of knowing for sure until she could see herself in a mirror.

Like Madeline, Mrs' Nelson wasn't sure what to do. She was worried that if she told anyone what had happened that god would be mad and return her and Jacob to their own bodies. This was a long shot, but did she want to risk that. Both Mrs. Nelson and her sister were silent thinking about what to do. Mrs. Nelson decided...
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Something else.

choices: The reconstruction was a success, now starts the healing process.
The reconstruction could have gone better, but Mark is still cancer free.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
Mrs. Abigail Nelson was now stuck in the body of her two year old son, while her son was in her body with cancer. Somehow reality had changed and now her son was her own mother, but he now had a fighting chance to survive the cancer. She didn't want to test god's will by speaking up and alerting everyone to the miracle.

Meanwhile, you left to go check on baby Jacob, and found Abigail's body lying in the hospital bed instead. You approached her to see if she was alright, not sure how your swap resulted in this…

"Excuse me ma'am… How are you feeling?" You asked her.

"Mommy?" The woman struggled to speak, "I want… home… Mommy?"

"I'm not your mommy… sorry. What do you remember?"

You asked several more questions, and realized she had the vocabulary and intellect of a two year old… something must have gone wrong with the swap. She wasn't giving you any useful information, just said mommy a lot and wanted to go home. You sighed and looked at your watch, realizing that you were needed in the recovery room any minute now.

You were in a slight hurry still, but you concentrated on Abigail's body in front of you, and what you imagined was Jacob's body in the hospital's chapel in another room. You decided to swap their intellect and sense of self.

Abigail's eyes lit up with intelligence as you could tell there was once again someone in that head who could reason. She looked around curiously, and then lifted her hands, fascinated by them somehow.

"What's going on? I'm not small… Am I an adult now? These hands don't look like mine." Abigail asked very coherently, in perfect English. Her memories still seemed to be a bit off, but she was functioning perfectly fine.

"Yes, you're an adult, those are your hands. You're going through chemotherapy remember? You have leukemia, but you should be ok now. The doctors caught it early and you're a strong woman, you can fight it." You reassured her with a warm smile.

"I just… I don't remember how I got this way." Abigail said, looking somewhat afraid.

"You'll be ok, your sister is here to take you home after this, where you will continue your recovery. Stay strong ok?"

And with that you left Abigail thinking you had helped save a life from cancer, which you likely would have. But Abigail and Jacob would never be the same again. In your swapping, Jacob now has the body and intelligence of his mother, but no memories of growing up to be a 21 year old woman. He still remembers being a 2 year old boy, and nothing past that. But those memories will quickly be forgotten as most baby memories are, and in a few years, the new Abigail will settle into her new life fairly well. She has the intellect required to be a functioning adult, but her mind is essentially an amnesiac, and she will have to create all new memories.

Meanwhile, Abigail is now in the body of her son, and has the reduced intellect of a 2 year old. She still remembers being a 21 year old woman, but it will take her some time before she can learn to speak well enough to tell the tale, and even then, who will believe her?

It was finally time to see how Mark's breast reconstruction had gone, and you wanted to be there at her bedside to make sure everything went smoothly…
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Mrs. Nelson decided to do nothing.  You discove...

choices: Tomorrow you help 'Marcy' home to rest, and spend the next week by her bedside.
Skip forward a bit to after she is recovered.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
"Billie! Good to see you!" Mark said with 'her' feminine voice that you had given to 'her' to fit her new female appearance. "It's great that you work as a volunteer at the same hospital that did my surgery, I'm so grateful that you're here to help…"

You smiled. This woman was of course your soon to be father-in-law. She wasn't really a woman, since she was born male, just like you. In this reality you both were shemales who had never gotten the operation to get a vagina. This seemed to be your power's way of rationalizing a male with a fully female appearance when it altered reality…

"It's good to see you too Marcy, how did the surgery go?" You asked. Marcy was the nickname Mark went by now, since it sounded more feminine, and was short for Marceline.

"It went great, I barely felt a thing since I was knocked out for most of it. They had to remove both breasts which were cancerous as you know… but luckily I could afford to get reconstruction and these new breast implants should work out nicely." Marcy said weakly, still recovering from the anesthesia.

"That's good, is there anything you need? The doctors said in a few days you'll be able to unwrap the gauze and see how your new breasts turned out. In a couple more weeks you might even be feeling good enough to come to the wedding?" You said with a smile.

"Of course Billie! You know I wouldn't miss it for the world, it's my daughter's special day! She's so lucky to have found you I'm still in denial myself. What are the odds that she would meet a girl just like her father? And fall in love no less! I just… I sincerely hope that she isn't just marrying you because you're like me." Marcy said softly.

You shook your head, "I know for a fact that's not true. Alisha and I love each other very much. Don't start putting that doubt into my head ok? Not this close to the wedding please…"

But you did know for a fact. Before all of this swapping happened, you were in a loving relationship with her already, as a fully male… man. But you wondered if she would have agreed to marriage back then even. You liked to think she would have regardless.

"Oh I know you do, don't worry about it. Still… I'm so happy that I'm going to be a grandfather soon, or is it grandmother? I supposed it doesn't matter. Your child is going to grow up in a very unique family you know? Two mother figures, and two grandmothers on Alisha's side of the family. Your father is going to be the only real male one in this child's life. Is he ready for this burden?" Marcy asked with a chuckle, as she coughed some fluids out a bit.

You rushed to her side with a towel in case she needed to throw up, but she seemed fine. She was still a bit weak from the surgery. "Don't worry my father is a great man. He will love being a grandpa, and you have no idea how happy he is. For years he had assumed Alisha and I were never going to get this far, but here we are. He was happy the day I proved him wrong."
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: The reconstruction was a success, now starts th...

choices: Marcy goes dress hunting with Alisha
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
With Marcy's recovery going so well the plans for the wedding moved forward quickly. The first step was to book a hall. You and Alisha knew of the most convenient place for your wedding. But when you first went to see the manager he was reluctant to rent his hall to a person like 'you.' But his homophobic attitudes are now of no account since he doesn't manage the hall anymore, his job now is to mop the floors. The new manager was very accommodating and was such a joy to deal with.

That is the way it went with everyone involved with your wedding (the caterer, the florist, the planner, the limo driver, the decorator, etc.). They were all very accommodating or you would swap them with someone who was more professional by either magically methods or more conventional means. The person you originally picked as the decorator now spends her time at her new job on street corners looking for clients.

Alisha was having a ball. Everyone she dealt with seemed to be just perfect. She didn't know why people said that it was hard work to put together a wedding. You knew that everything was going to be perfect if you had anything to say about it. And you did have allot to say.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Moving forward towards the wedding

choices: The ceremony starts, Alisha looks stunning.
As you prepare for the ceremony, more drama from Alisha's family starts.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
Now that Mark was now Marcy, and Marcy had finally recovered from her breast reconstruction, Alisha's parents were now in full support of your marriage, and were even willing to pay for half the wedding! This was lucky because you and Alisha couldn't afford anything like a ceremony with your meager college budget, and your parents were going to pay for the other half.

The day of the wedding finally came, and you found yourself wrapped in a beautiful white wedding dress, but you opted to go without a veil and a train and all the frilly features that the bride should have. You wanted Alisha to have the spotlight today, as it was her special day as the real bride. Your dress consisted of a hemline that came down to your ankles, and a pair of strappy white low heeled sandals that clicked as you walked. You still had some trouble walking in them, but everyone insisted that you wear heels, as it just wouldn't go with the dress to wear anything else.

You wore your short hair a similar cute pixie style to what you'd been wearing it in recently, but it had grown out more over the past month, and was long enough to cover your ears even, being a few inches long. You had finally located the hospital volunteer and got your old job as a salon assistant back. With that knowledge in your head once again, you knew just what kinds of oils and conditioner to make it shine and have smooth bangs that you could control. In the end it was a very cute look for a girl with short hair, and you were pleased with it.

Alisha loved how smoothly everything was going. She was surprised just how willing everyone was cooperating with setting up a marriage between a woman and a transwoman who was legally male. Of course she had no idea that you were swapping people's jobs around to find the best people for the task, and those who were open minded enough to work with you. You were unable to have the wedding in a church, due to your special circumstances, but you had finally found a wedding hall that would work beautifully. You decided on having the ceremony outside in a beautiful garden, and then using the wedding hall for the reception. Alisha fell in love with the location immediately, and you knew this is where it would happen.

You decided to avoid inviting a huge number of people, inviting only your close family members, including your aunts and uncles, and cousins, and your closest friends that knew about your secret. Beyond that, most of your family didn't understand what you were, since your gender wasn't really something that your family talked about outside of your close relatives. As far as they were concerned, you were a woman getting a lesbian marriage, and they didn't need to know the details.

Alisha had a similar issue, but with her father being transgender like you, you thought her family would be as understanding as your own. But it turned out Marcy's siblings and parents did not support her shemale lifestyle, but they had a falling out many years ago and were pretty much over it. Alisha's aunts and uncles and cousins showed up, but they were quite surprised to find out Alisha was marrying someone similar to Marcy. You could tell the older ones looked at you with scorn, furthering their embarrassing family by having two transgendered in the family now instead of just Marcy. Alisha's grandparents didn't even attend, they were so disapproving of the wedding. But you didn't care what they thought, this was Alisha's special day and you didn't want to start any drama.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: The big day arrives

choices: Many years later, your children are coming of age...
Have some fun at the wedding reception!
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
It was a beautifully sunny day as the sounds of the wedding march played and the wedding party walked down the aisle. You walked towards the altar alongside your father, who seemed conflicted on whether he should be proud of you, or still coming to terms with his biological son wearing a wedding gown. But in this reality you'd grown up as a girl since a very young child, so he expected this day would come someday, he just never thought it would be so soon.

You carefully stepped along in the white strappy heels, letting the long white dress flutter behind you in the light breeze. You smiled as you saw your sister Alex, standing near the front of the stage as your maid of honor. You had considered whether or not you should have a best man, but there were no male friends of yours that were as close to you as your own sister was, and it seemed fitting that she should be your maid of honor. She was dressed in a beautiful flowery dress with her gorgeous blonde hair teased out in curls over her shoulders, and you were worried she might even eclipse Alisha's beauty. She smiled back at you and you took your place at the front of the stage near her.

Next came Alisha's maid of honor, her best friend who you had only met a few times, and had to fly in from out of state to be a part of the wedding. Her name was Rachel and she was a cute girl with black hair currently tied up in a sophisticated bun, contrasting Alex's curly blonde hair nicely. She wore an identical dress to Alex, since you and Alisha had made sure all the bridesmaids had matching dresses. It was rather unorthodox having a wedding between two women, even if only one was biologically female. So you had to improvise a bit, and decided to have two maids of honor and the rest of the bridesmaids would be friends of both of yours.

Next you saw April and Hannah walking down the aisle together, wearing bridesmaids dresses as well. In this reality they were actually close friends of yours, and it would have been rude of you to not invite them to the wedding. April had quite a stage presence herself, being an actress, and had to make sure she toned it down a bit so she didn't take attention away from you or Alisha.

After several more bridesmaids, including friends of Alisha's, walked up to the front, you heard the sounds of "Here Comes the Bride", the traditional wedding song. You looked down to the other side of the garden and saw Alisha in a huge and beautifully elegant wedding dress. She had petticoats and ruffles and everything feminine you could think of, minus a corset. She was two months pregnant now, and a slight baby bump was visible if you looked close enough. The elegant dress hid this however, and no one would know any better, except your closest friends.

Alisha was escorted down the aisle by her 'mother' Marcy, who was technically her biological father. Marcy was wearing a blue gown that actually accentuated her new breasts quite well. The reconstruction had finally healed and she was confident enough to flaunt them at her daughter's wedding. Sure they were implants, but they looked a hell of a lot better than her old natural ones before the mastectomy. She looked incredibly proud to be escorting her daughter to your side, and was especially proud with how helpful you had been during her surgery recovery. You had swapped back your job with the hospital volunteer, but you had still spent considerable time helping Marcy heal during the past few weeks.

Alisha stepped up to the altar in heels similar to yours, but hers were taller due to her height. With her high heels she was still a few inches shorter than you, but no one seemed to notice. She looked absolutely radiant in her wedding dress, and her hair had been professionally styled by Sandi, the woman you work with at the salon. It turns out she has experience doing hair for weddings and volunteered to style Alisha's for free! Alisha's hair was long and the fringe from the front was wrapped around and braided behind her head, framing her face. Below the braid she had waves of curls flowing down her back, with a gold hair clip and chain holding a partial updo in place above the braid. She looked like an absolute goddess standing there before you, and you were glad you didn't try to compete with her. This was her day to shine.

Her smile completely disarmed you as she stood in front of you, holding both of your hands as the officiant went through his routine of asking you to say your vows. You barely paid attention to him as you were completely focused on Alisha's deep green eyes. You couldn't help but notice her makeup was impeccable, with eyeliner drawing attention to the deep pools of emerald glistening in the sunlight.

The two of you said your vows, and your heart was beginning to pound. You hated being up on stage in front of so many people, even if it was a relatively small wedding, and everyone here knew you more or less.

The officiant finally asked, "Do you, Billie, take Alisha as your lawfully wedded wife?"

"I do…" You nervously said in your feminine voice.

"And Alisha, do you take Billie as your lawfully wedded… um… husband?" He asked.

Alisha giggled a bit, "Of course I do…"

"Then by the power vested in me, I hereby pronounce you… husband… and wife. You may now kiss the bride, either of you." The man smiled, realizing how awkward a situation this was.

You smiled and leaned in for the most tender and passionate kiss you'd ever given Alisha, and she responded in kind. Most of the audience cheered wildly for you two, except for a few of Alisha's disapproving family, who gave a halfhearted clap. To them you were two girls in beautiful dresses kissing at their wedding, and they sighed, realizing it was like Marcy's wedding all over again.

With your kiss to Alisha however, you'd arranged for doves to be released into the garden, and they fluttered around you before scattering. You held Alisha's hand up in the air, and she remembered the engagement ring she still wore which had two birds interlocked around the stones in the middle when both of you locked fingers. This now sat next to a proper wedding ring which you now both wore, and she gave you yet another deep and sensual kiss in front of everyone.

And lastly over the applause, the officiant announced, "I present to you, Billie and Alisha Hopper!"
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: The ceremony starts, Alisha looks stunning.

choices: Your children grow up to be successful and you live happily with Alisha.
At sixteen, Abigail and April discover powers of their own... a new beginning?
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
Sixteen years have passed. You are still happily married to Alisha, the mother of your three children. The first two were twin girls, April and Abigail (or Abby for short), almost about to turn sweet sixteen. They were quite a handful, but growing up with two loving mothers had raised the to be very forward thinking and open minded. You were incredibly proud of both of them, and noticed them already growing up to be beautiful young women in their own right. As twins they were incredibly close, and rarely left each other's side.

Alisha insisted on naming your son William, or Bill, after the male version of your name. She wanted to make sure Bill felt like he was a part of the family. You both knew that a boy growing up with two mothers and two sisters was going to have a rough time fitting in, and as a fourteen year old boy he was definitely having trouble adjusting. You worried he would try and follow in your and Marcy's footsteps, that he would end up identifying as a female as he grew up. So far however, he seemed like a normal boy, even if he was the slightest bit feminine from having grown up in a house full of women.

As for you, Billie, you had become quite the woman. After sixteen years your brown hair had grown out several times, long enough that you needed to cut it quite often. You now wore your hair long enough to reach the small of your back, and had learned a lot about styling over the years, now styling it yourself. You no longer worked at a salon, but you had learned much from your experiences there.

You had graduated college as Computer Engineer as you had always wanted, being one of the few 'women' in your graduating class. You were quickly hired right out of school, and found yourself rising through the pay grade year after year. It turned out women were in high demand in engineering, though most of them had no idea of your born gender. You were now a very well paid hardware designer whose presence was in high demand at many companies. Any company who wasn't willing to hire a woman as their senior designer due to any kind of misogyny, realized you were quickly hired up by another company that didn't care about your gender. However as the years went by you wondered if you had hit this mythical glass ceiling everyone had always talked about, but you were already making more than enough to support your family, so you didn't think much of it.

Alisha on the other hand continued to attend college for years after you graduated, seeking to get her PhD she'd always dreamt of getting. She had wanted to take some time off of school to raise the kids when they were first born, but you reminded her that you were equally capable of caring for the children. The two of you took turns changing diapers, preparing food, and even breast feeding. Being around newborn twins awoke your motherly instincts, and you found that you could actually produce breast milk. It was rather a mystery to medical science, but you suspected it had something to do with the way you had acquired this female body in the first place.

With four breasts between you and Alisha, the two of you could easily keep twin girls fed, and Alisha was able to continue school. The two of you wasted little time after the twins were born, and quickly Alisha became pregnant again. When William was born however, it nearly became too much. Alisha had to start taking fewer classes at school, and you spent a lot more time caring for William during the early days. He took a liking to your flavor of breast milk, and eventually began refusing Alisha's. William grew very attached to you even from an early age, while the twins, Abby and April seemed to equally like both of their mothers.

Finally years later the twins were attending their first year of elementary school, and Alisha was granted her PhD in Theoretical Physics. She became a researcher and an assistant professor at the university, even though she was only 27 years old. By the age of 35 she was a full tenured professor, and had published several noteworthy papers in her field. Now the two of you were 37, and the twins were 15 (nearly 16), and William was 14, and your family was finally on track for success.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Many years later, your children are coming of a...

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
And so this long tale comes to a happy ending. With your children growing up, your wife Alisha accomplishing her dreams and pursuing new ones, and you becoming a successful breadwinner for the family, things are looking up for the Hoppers.

As the years went on you used your powers less and less, but would occasionally use them in emergencies. You realized the dangers of changing reality, but you never once tried to undo any of your old changes that had turned you into the transwoman you are today. Your powers may or may not have helped in getting the multitude of promotions over the years, and maybe had helped Alisha get her tenureship at her age. But you never revealed your power to anyone, not even your own wife.

This was probably for the best, as you knew that your power tended to only bring trouble when abused. You wanted your family to happily live a long and relatively normal life together.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: The end

choices: April and Abby Know They Both Have the Same Power, Then Try It Out Together
They Don't Know That They Both Have the Same Power, and Try It Out Separately
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
On their sixteenth birthday, twin sisters April and Abigail (Abby, for short) woke up to a very strange feeling. They didn't know how it was possible, but they just knew that they had a new ability - a power to swap physical and mental traits between two people. Their shemale mother Billie had kept her swap powers a secret and had only used it sparingly since the wedding, but now she also realized something - she no longer had the power. Whatever her life was like now, it seemed that this was how it would be until the day she died. Of course, that wasn't really true. With April and Abby having the power, there was a good chance that Billie's reality would change again, but as she no longer had the power herself, she wouldn't notice if anything changed.

So, did April and Abby know that they both had the swapping power? Or did they separately discover they had it, and didn't tell each other about it, opting to try it out on their own?
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Turning 16, Abigail and April Now Have the Power

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
The moment April and Abby woke up, they immediately looked at each other and just knew that they both had the power to swap physical and mental traits between people. They didn't know how it was possible that they could have this power, or how they could possibly know that they had it at all, if they had never used it before, but they just did. And further than that, they felt that the power was linked between them.

What they would soon find out was that when one of them made a swap happen, they would both still retain their memories that they had before the swap, but everyone else would act as though whatever had changed was how it was always supposed to be, as reality changed with the swap.

So who tried the swapping power first?
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: April and Abby's Power is Linked

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
The moment April and Abby woke up, they immediately knew that they both had the power to swap physical and mental traits between people. They didn't know how it was possible that they could have this power, or how they could possibly know that they had it at all, if they had never used it before, but they just did.

What they would soon find out was that when one of them made a swap happen, they would still retain the memories that they had before the swap, thus being aware of the changes, but everyone else would act as though whatever had changed was how it was always supposed to be, as reality changed with the swap.

If April used the power to swap something, Abby wouldn't notice that anything changed, since April was the one who used the power. But if Abby used the power, then April wouldn't notice that anything had changed, since Abby was the one who used the power.

At the moment, they chose to keep their power a secret from each other.

So who tried the swapping power first?
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: April and Abby's Power is Separate From Each Other

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
Now that Mark was now Marcy, and Marcy had finally recovered from her breast reconstruction, Alisha's parents were now in full support of your marriage, and were even willing to pay for half the wedding! This was lucky because you and Alisha couldn't afford anything like a ceremony with your meager college budget, and your parents were going to pay for the other half.

Marcy's recovery was a slow process which allowed for you to develop your powers. You had spent so much time trying to make things right over the last few months that you didn't take the time to see the extent of your powers. At first you thought that you had to be very close to your targets (those who you swapped traits with). Then you realized that you just had to know where they were, as long as they weren't too far away. But over the last few weeks you realized that you could sense where everyone who you made a swap with was. It was at this point you realized that you could truly put everything right back the way it had been. You debated upon doing this. You could be a man again. You were technically a man now, but you could be a complete man, just as you had been, but is that what you wanted?

Thinking about this, you realized how so much had changed and you thought about not only what you wanted, but how things were. If you swapped everything back, you wouldn't be the same person you are now. If you switched everything back, would you even be getting married? Then another facet of your power came to you, you could see in your mind how each change effected you and those around you. You could see how a change that was between two people (not yourself) changed your history too. Seeing everything you realized that if you returned everything to the way it was before this started that you wouldn't be getting married now. It all started so innocently with a swap of hair, but somehow everything was related (like a goddess writing out chapters of your life) and it all led you to here. If you returned everything you would go back to being the relatively shy boy you were before. You knew you couldn't go back to that. But with all this, you also realized that you had changed so much by all the swaps made and that every person swapped was just as responsible for this wedding as everyone else in your life. Through magic you realized that those people were more responsible for your wedding than even your mom and dad who you had never swapped in these last few months.

Then you had a revelation, you wanted everyone who you had swapped at your wedding. They were all responsible for your happy day. Not just the nice people, but the nasty ones too. It was like one big story that led to this and they all played a part, if you lost even one chapter the wedding wouldn't come about. The final hurdle was Marcy. You realized that if you hadn't made a change with him even though you were prepared to have a wedding, it would have never happened so you were ingratiated not only to him, but to the nasty woman at the salon. If Marcy was going to be at the wedding so should that woman.

The wedding was going to be big. You were going to invite your and Alisha's close family, but also relatives you hadn't seen in years, along with friends and neighbors and friends and business associates of both your parents and Alisha's parents. You decided to swap out the relationships of some of these people with those who you have changed so they would come to the wedding. Not everyone you had to change, Sandi who is the stylist at the salon and your boss would be invited. Jen, Alex's friend would be invited and so would be her dad, Larry since they were neighbors. Larry brought Monica as his date. Monica had been dating Jen when she had swapped social lives with her dad. April was now a very good friend at school. You liked her allot too, it was her talent and confidence that allowed you to perform in front of hundreds of people at the play. It was a rush you would never forget. You couldn't forget to invite Nate your costar in the play and Hannah formerly April's friend but now yours too.

But there were so many people who you wanted to invite besides them. Paul the adult man who now has the social life of his little eight year old brother now think they are family friends of Alisha's family and were invited to the wedding. Little Joey (the 43 year old man who had the mind of a toddler) and his wife and of course the baby who had the intellect of an adult and his mother. Both became distant relatives of yours and Alisha and would be sat at the same table at the reception. The hostess at the Italian Restaurant was there as that restaurant did all the catering for your wedding. (It was a no brainer to have that Italian Restaurant do the catering for the wedding. As was having the people at the salon doing all the hair and makeup for the wedding party.) You invited the hostess (you had her job for a while) to attend the ceremony too. Plus the very nice woman who was a candy striper at the hospital just had to come.

Everyone at the salon who had any contact with you magically was invited. It didn't matter if they were nice people or not, if they were changed you invited them (and you made sure they all came. Margaret the formerly bitchy woman who now is now the daughter of a domineering woman came along with the woman's former daughter, Amber whose life had flourished after getting out from under the thumb of her 'former mom.'

There were also all the people at the club who had to be invited, The women who had danced with Alisha while you were jealous and had been swapped in some way. Juanita the former Latina who is now a nice American 'man' had to be invited. You also had to make arrangements for Chad who was deported to Honduras to be returned to the US for your wedding. There was the man who you were dancing with, who had swapped his sexual preference with Juanita and then danced with Alisha too. There was the woman who entered the restroom ready to puke her brains out but left the restroom as if she hadn't had more than a glass of wine. There was the woman who now has most of your body shape. You never knew her name, but you owed so much to her and you could never repay her.

Finally you had to invite all your friends at your college, whether they were from your days as an engineering major or a drama major (or the short time you were a nursing major.)

You even invited the bigoted former manager of the hall where the reception was to be held (who is now the janitor) as well as the former decorator who now earns his living on street corners. Neither would be working on your wedding, but they would attend even if they weren't quite sure why they had accepted nor really wanted to go.

You wrote out invitations for all of these people and changed their relationships with you and Alisha such that they would come. Soon all the invites were sent and you would make sure that everyone could make it. Once everyone accepted, you would have to decide who was seated together at the reception. You supposed the people from the salon would be seated together, the people from the club would be seated together and the people from college would also be seated together regardless of whether they were in the same major. Also the hostess from the restaurant (who was catering the wedding) would be an invited guest of the reception and would share the table with Joey and his wife and the toddler with his mother.

You decided to stop using your powers after the wedding. But during the reception since it would be the last time, you would swap people at random. It was your special wedding day and so you thought you could have your fun. Men, women children it didn't matter. You were strong enough now that you could swap them all back to 'normal' or at least the way they had come at the end of the evening so you didn't have any problem making any changes you liked.

The day of the wedding finally came, and you found yourself wrapped in a beautiful white wedding dress, but you opted to go without a veil and a train and all the frilly features that the bride should have. You wanted Alisha to have the spotlight today, as it was her special day as the real bride. Your dress consisted of a hemline that came down to your ankles, and a pair of strappy white low heeled sandals that clicked as you walked. You still had some trouble walking in them, but everyone insisted that you wear heels, as it just wouldn't go with the dress to wear anything else.

You wore your short hair a similar cute pixie style to what you'd been wearing it in recently, but it had grown out more over the past month, and was long enough to cover your ears even, being a few inches long. You had finally located the hospital volunteer and got your old job as a salon assistant back. With that knowledge in your head once again, you knew just what kinds of oils and conditioner to make it shine and have smooth bangs that you could control. In the end it was a very cute look for a girl with short hair, and you were pleased with it.

Alisha loved how smoothly everything was going. She was surprised just how willing everyone was cooperating with setting up a marriage between a woman and a transwoman who was legally male. Of course she had no idea that you were swapping people's jobs around to find the best people for the task, and those who were open minded enough to work with you.

Next Chapter: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: The magical big day arrives

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
Finally Alisha was back to normal. "This was great," you thought. All you have to do was get your body back and you could marry her. But you didn't know if you could ever find the 'girl' with your body so you thought, "Well, Joey's body is now male, why not take that." True he was a bit older than you but all in all it was a good looking body, besides you had your own face and genitals. That is what counted.

You looked down at your body one last time. You noticed you boobs, they were better than Alisha's. You thought, well why waist these lovelies on a baby and you swapped them one last time with Alisha. Then the plan was to swap your body with Joey's and then propose marriage to Alisha. This would be your last swap ever.

"Alisha, I have something to tell you," you told her before the swap. Then you concentrated on Joey's body. A moment later, you looked down to see if it had worked. Looking down indeed your boobs were gone and then you looked up when you heard Alisha say, "What to you have to say?"

Your mind went fuzzy and you told Alisha the truth, "I love you, Mommy."

"Mommy, loves lit'l Billy too," she said and she smiled at you. Mommy was your whole world.

Alisha then got up out of her seat and she approached you. She stuck out her hand and you grabbed it. "Come Billy, let's wash up before dinner comes." she said.

You dutifully gout out of your seat and tottered with her towards the ladysroom. When you got there, she stuck a hand down the back of your pants and then helped you onto the changing table.

Mommy then started talking while she undressed you. You couldn't understand exactly what she said but she said it in such a cheerful tone that you smiled at her.

"You are such a silly, boy, do you know that. Yes you are, yes you are. You thought that you could gain magic powers just by falling over a book bag. How silly of you. The truth is I'm a witch and it was me who was doing all those things. You might be happy to know everyone is back to normal. But it never once occurred to you that you were making yourself more and more feminine. I enjoyed every minute of it. I would flirt with someone and all of a sudden you would make yourself more and more girl like.

You spent two whole months doing women's hair. You enjoyed it and then later you pretended you enjoyed it. It was great watching you 'acting' girlie. Watching you in the last dress rehearsal for the play in that huge ballgown, flouncing around the stage and singing for all you were worth. Did you have to make the kiss so convincing???"

"But now and for the rest of your life, you will act like a two year old and call me Mommy. If you want to know why I did it? Well I'll tell you, do you remember the night when I wanted to go out and you said you were too tired and then went out with your buddies instead?....."

Alisha meant everything to you, regardless of gender the love between you was something you would do anything for. With a quick thought you took back the Alisha’s faminity and it seemed odd, but you instantly felt more at ease in your – sort of – own skin. You looked at Alisha, at the strong man sitting across from you and knew that instant that you had made the right decision, you wanted to be his wife and the mother to his children someday. “Babe, I love you, I can’t imagine not being with you and I want us to be happy. This is a big decision that I cannot make on a dime, but it is Out decision to make together,” you told her, stretching your hand toward her, Alisha reached out and held it in her big, warm hands. You looked down at your clasped hands, relishing the sensation of his hand enveloping yours. You made up your mind to find female genitalia to replace your own and finish what you had started in what felt like a lifetime ago.

“I’m so glad that you see it that way darling,” Alisha said, squeezing your hand. “I know I haven’t been the best I can be for you lately. I’ve been distant and I am very sorry if I’ve made you feel bad. I’ve been trying to search my feelings for you, for us and understand where we should go from here,” she admitted. You couldn’t help but tear up as he spoke.

“Frankly, I don’t have all the answers, all I know is that I want us to be together and make sure you are happy with who you are and who we are,” Alisha continued. You felt your heart flutter as he spoke. Alisha was the man you loved, he wanted you to be happy and you wanted him to be happy. You continued to chat about your relationship for a while as you eat your dinner.

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
Time had been dragging by and soon the play would be in its premier and you were no closer to finding Joey and returning Alisha back to normal. It was also straining your male ego to be so girly all the time. There was the work at the salon, and the play and the drama classes and all the rest of it. It was time to do the best you could and return to a 'normal life'.

You had grown by the experience. You found you truly loved Alisha. You had been through so much with her, even though she didn't know it. She had been with you throughout and now it was time to set things as straight as it could be.

You had a plan and called Alisha. "Alisha, I'm taking you out for a fun night tomorrow....don't get dressed up." you said and then you hung up the phone.

She called back, but all you said was that you would pick her up and take care of everything.

choices: Getting everything back to the way it was
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
This was the lynch pin of your plan. There was one big problem, physically where it counted you and Alisha were both the same sex. You had hoped that you could find Joey, but who knew if you ever would. The first step was to get Alisha back to being a woman. The best way was to actually have her dress like a man.

You picked Alisha up. You were wearing jeans and a t-shirt. Alisha was wearing a dress. You said don't get dressed up so it wasn't a very fancy dress, but despite her male body, she was dressed fancier than you.

"Hey, is that how you dress to take me out?" she half joked.

"I have something planned," you said

"Am I over dressed?"

"It doesn't matter, you'll be 'changing' soon enough."

"What does that mean?"

"You'll see," you said mysteriously. You then took Alisha to a formal dress shop that rents dresses and tuxedos. You then rented very formal clothing for you and for Alisha. Alisha with her mostly male body wore the tux and you wore an elegant gown. Then you used all your makeup skills on both you and Alisha. With your feminine body there was no doubt you were a woman. Alisha still had her pretty face and long hair, with makeup, even in the tux she might be mistaken as a woman too.

You then took her to a large hall that was having a formal dance. Tonight it was for gays and lesbians only. "I thought you would like a night out of dancing. Not clubbing, but real dancing where you can get close and enjoy the music and actually see each other.

"But why am I wearing the tux?"

"Because you look better in it than I do, silly."

During the course of the night. You looked at the other couples, you were looking for a butch lesbian. You didn't want to steal the vagina from a real woman. You supposed butch lesbians were real women, but this was the best you could do. When you found one you liked. (You weren't sure exactly what the criterian was.) You bumped into her and spilled your drink. You were all apologetic insisting you pay for the stain. You wanted the woman's address just in case you ever found, Alisha's real body.

"I think we should go," you told Alisha.

She agreed. Before leaving the ballroom you swapped Alisha's male genitals with the woman who now had a stain on her suit jacket.

You left with Alisha to return your clothing and head home. On the way, you swapped your feminine body with Alisha's masculine one leaving the proper genitals in place. Now you were all man and Alisha was all woman.

Then you broke out laughing, "We fooled them all," you said.

With reality changed, you weren't a gay couple anymore, you were a straight couple. "I guess we did. But why did you want to?"

"It's all part of my master plan."

"I don't know how you convinced me to go through with it." Now that she was back to normal, she didn't know why she would ever go on with what had happened. But it had obviously happened

"I can be very persuasive when I want to be."

"Well I have had enough of this cross dressing thing."

"OK, next time, you can wear the lovely gown and I'll wear the tux."

"It's a bet."

"Great, next week, we'll do it again. I want to see you in this dress anyway."

"Fine."

"I'm going to be busy all week, I might not be able to see you before then."

"You have something planned."

"I don't know," you said mysteriously.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Night of dykes

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
The next day, you called in rescheduled all your appointments at the salon and cut all your classes. You were determined to get your old life back. This meant you old major...whatever it was...and working back at MacDonalds. You phoned your clients one by one and moved them into the open spots. It wasn't easy to do but you did your best. You also called the elderly lady whose memories you still had and gave them back to her. She had bought an Xbox and was playing it every day since the swap. You weren't sure what you gave up for her memories, so you got nothing back in return.

The next step was to go to school and track down April and Margaret. You wanted to give April back her part in the play and Margaret her singing voice. You debated whether to give both to April so she could sing the part, but decided against it. It took some doing, but you were determined to find them. Margaret was easy since her schedule never changed and April you found with the help of some of her friends who still were in your drama class.

The last step was to give the stylist her job back and take over in MacDonalds. You had mixed feelings about the stylist job, the money was good, but it was so girlie and people would think you were gay if you returned with your fully male body.

So you went back to the mundane job at MacDonalds. It didn't pay as much as the salon, it was pretty boring. But you really didn't have the personality anymore to stand the stylist job anymore anyway.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Getting everything back to the way it was

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
While working at MacDonalds you heard the snickering from your fellow employees. You may act like a man but in several respects you still moved like a woman. You still had Juanita's sex appeal. You couldn't fix Juanita all the way. She was Chad now and Chad was off in Honduras somewhere, never be return to the United States.

You decided to return Juanita's, now Chad's, sex appeal. It was true, she was a guy now, but she was right, she or it he would get over it. Money fixes lots of problems. Plus he had gained so much, he was a citizen now of respect and status. Maybe a little humility would be in order. You went to his mansion.


He came to the door, "Do I know you?" he asked. In this reality you had never met.

"No, I guess not." Then you swapped your sexuality with his and left. Chad didn't know what to think and so he simply closed the door and went back to what he was doing before.

Did you swap Paul back with his brother? You weren't sure, so you found them and made sure that Paul liked girls better than legos. That was the final piece of the puzzle (or so you hoped) one thing left to do.
1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.title: Fixing loose ends

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
You picked up the now totally feminine Alisha. She looked great in a body that had been yours for over two months. You were both glad to be rid of it and sorry it was gone at the same time.

"OK, are you ready for our date?"

"Yes, you have been so mysterious lately."

"As I promised we are going out. But first lets get dressed like before...but this time you wear the dress."

"You looked so silly in that dress." This is how Alisha remembered it. You were a man in a lady's dress and it looked quite silly. She being a woman in a tux didn't look as bad.

"I know I do, but now and from now on forever the dresses will all be yours."

"Of course, they will." Alisha didn't remember the two months you spend in dresses, nor your time in the salon, not even you having long hair or any of the things that had happened.

"What do you have planned?"

"Oh, nothing special. I have tickets to the premier of a play. I heard it is very good. I know one of the actresses in the play."

"Have you been cheating on me with this girl?" Alisha said playfully.

"Never on you!!!"

You and Alisha went to the play and it was great. Alice never lost a beat and was flawless in her performance. Even her singing was very good. Then after the play you took her to the Italian Restaurant. She didn't remember going here as often as she did before you made all the swaps back.

You had arranged with the hostess for a special dessert. The dessert came with a ring and you got down on your knees to propose. This was totally unexpected from Alisha, but she accepted immediately.

"I don't believe it!!!" she cried.

Well I have been going through allot of changes recently, and I have decided what I really want. And what I really want is to be married to you and spend the rest of my life with you. Alisha threw herself into your arms.

Larry, heard the conversation and wished he could go, but he was too old for clubbing. At least he couldn't go without a young date. He thought about Monica. He couldn't quite remember why they had broken up, but he missed her. Then he decided, "Hey guy's maybe I could go to the club with you?"

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
Since the night at the restaurant, Joey made the life of a toddler his own. Physically he was an adult. Actually with all of Alisha's features he was actually physically a woman. The only difference physically between Joey and the old Alisha was his face and his hair. You had originally swapped Alisha's hair with his as part of the total swap, but then you realized that the hair wasn't Alisha's it was Alex's and it was your first swap so you couldn't give it away to this 'man.' Instead of swapping the hair, you only swapped the hair styles.

But despite being physically a woman, Joey in is mind was still male and all his preferences, although quite babyish were all 'masculine.' He had to wear baby clothes that fit his female body, but they were in boys colors of blues and reds. He dressed in shirts that had cartoons on them, but they had designs of sailboats and fire engines, not flowers and kittens that you would expect on a girl's outfit.

He lived the life of a toddler, but not the life of the toddler he had swapped with. He had his own preferences. He enjoyed sailing as an adult, he didn't sail anymore but he had lots of toy boats in his toy chest.

You were wrong, he wasn't going to be a 'toddler' forever, it is just that his maturity would grow at a slower rate. He was thirty-six years old now, but mentally and emotionally he was twenty-seven months. At his rate of 'normal' growth, his maturity would be approaching that of a three year old when he was close to fifty years old. If he lived that long he be attending kindergarten for the first time when he was in his seventies.

His life now lived on the strict schedule of a two year old. He always woke up at the same time and went to sleep at the same time. His life was divided into units: he had eating time, nap time, play time, bath time, etc. This regularity was comforting to his baby mentality. Whenever a change in schedule would happen, such as when he had to see the doctor, he would fuss, but his wife knew that all could be calmed if he was given his pacifier and his favorite stuffed toy.

This is why he and Helen always came to the restaurant every week. It was part of the schedule and along with everything else, Joey would fuss if they didn't follow through on the ritual.

1231122131323111121112231221231232121221.content:
The thing with Quinn and Amy didn't work but you didn't want to give up. With your new body, even without your bubble-butt, you were hit upon by lots of men. One caught you while you were heading for your car. You chatted a bit and when he discovered that you were going to MacDonalds she asked if he could come with you.

You arrive at MacDonalds at lunch time and the place was packed with many people. In the corner you happened to notice an adult man who was clearly mentally challenged with an older woman you assumed must be his mother. There were also children in the ballpit and teenagers goofing off.

You got on line and when you reached the front of the line you saw a familiar face. It was the 'former stylist' who now had your job at MacDonalds. A smile was plastered onto her face. You knew from experience that the smile wasn't real, it was simply stressed by the manager that all employees must smile. You had done it for hours on end. The woman didn't recognize you.

She asked you what you wanted maintaining the smile on her face. Your new fashion sense stressed style over comfort and so between your four inch high heels, thong and push-up bra you weren't the most comfortable. You wondered if she could keep that smile on her face if she was wearing such things. You decided to swap with her and you would get those things back before leaving the restaurant. After all you did look good wearing those things.

You were about three inches shorter than the stylist before you traded shoes with her. After the swap eleven inches shorter than she was. You started to give her your order when you felt something on your backside. It was your 'dates' hand. He decided to take a cheap feel while you were distracted.

You swapped your date with the mentally challenged man. When you turned around, you saw your 'dates' mother. Not the woman who was with the now perfectly normal boy, but the man you was with actual mother. In this reality the man is never without supervision. "You must pardon my son, he doesn't know what he is doing."

"Is that right?"

"Well you know, we were sitting over there and I turned my head for just a second and he got away from me." Then to her boy, "Tell the nice lady you are sorry."

"I'm sorry," he said dutifully. The intelligence had gone out of his eyes and his mouth was a little ajar. You could tell that he was special just at one site of him.

You smiled at the man and accepted his apology. Soon the lady was leading her son back to their table. Your food was ready and you took it to a table of your own. You were in a playful mood as you looked around the restaurant.

What do you do next?

“So what are you going to do?” asks your cousin on the phone. Although you know that reality was very different just a moment before, something tells you that the male voice on the other end of the line is Leon, your formerly female cousin Linda. “Huh? What do you mean?” you ask back. “What are you going to do about the baby, Billie? I mean, you said the father is married! That’s a big deal,” Leon exclaims. “I don’t know, I don’t know, Leon, but … “ you trail off, grappling with new memories popping in your mind, with how different your voice sounds in your ears and how strange the situation is. By making that swap with your cousin you’ve become a woman, specifically a woman carrying the child of a married man.

“You have to talk to him, whatever the circumstances, he’s the father and he’s gotta step up for that baby you’re carrying,” he says, with a distinct edge to his voice.

You feel at a loss, just like Linda had before becoming Leon. “I … I … I … guess you’re right, but … I think I gotta sort this all out in my head, thank you for listening, cuz, luv ya.”

You clicked the phone off and headed back to your room to figure out your next move. Your powers were really astonishing, and undeniable you thought as you saw the remarkable changes to your body. In reality you didn’t look too different, more like a female version of your previous self. You had feminine curves, but not cartoonishly so. However, there was a life growing inside you and you had to figure what to do about that.

You headed to your bedroom to try to sort through your current situation. You dearly loved your cousin and swapping with her had been a no-brainer if it meant getting her out of a situation like that, but now you had to figure out what to do about it. You were still deep in thought when you heard a noise coming from your nightstand. You hadn’t noticed it before, but a purse was laying on it and the noise was coming from within. You reached inside and grabbed the buzzing cellphone inside it. The screen read, ‘Daniel’ and you instantly knew it was the baby’s father. You didn’t feel up to dealing with him at the moment so you let it go to voice mail. “How am I supposed to fix this?” you say out-loud, patting the spot on your belly where you imagine the baby to be.

The phone dings, letting you know the voicemail is waiting for you to listen to it. “Ugh, better get this over with, I guess,” you say, clicking on the cassette tape icon on the phone. “Billie, answer the phone please!” the voicemail starts, Daniel’s voice has a distinct tinge of fear in it, “We Have to talk, I … I need to talk to you. Meet me at hotel on 5th and Garret Avenue at six tonight, please.”

You don’t know what to do, whether to go meet with Daniel or figure something else.

It took a while before you made up your mind, but in the end you decided to hear what Daniel had to say. You made your way to the hotel he’d mentioned in the message, feeling wholly self-conscious the entire way there. You didn’t exactly feel comfortable in your now female body, but it didn’t feel new either; it was a bit of a dissonant experience. Daniel hadn’t specified where in the hotel to meet, so you waited in the lobby for a bit. A short while after you arrived you felt a hand gently tap you on the shoulder from behind. Turning around you were met by a tall, blonde man, with chiseled features, deep blue eyes, dressed in a dark-grey suit. You somehow knew this was Daniel, and something instinctual stirred inside you as your eyes met; probably the same as what used to stir in your cousin when they met.


“Thank you for coming Billie, I …” he started to say, a bit of a sad edge to his voice, “ I got us a room so we can talk more privately.”


You simply nodded, trying to deal with the new sensations your body was bombarding you with. The ride up the elevator was silent and awkward and you noticed that Daniel could barely look you in the eyes when you looked up at him; noticing that you’d lost a couple of inches in the swap as well. Once you go the room he opened the door for you and motioned for a pair of chairs inside.


“Billie, I …“ he said hesitantly, “Oh, my goodness, Daniel, just spit it out, you haven’t been able to look me straight the whole way from the lobby,”


He breathed a heavy sight, “Look, I’m caught between a rock and a hard place, I can’t leave my wife, but I’m not about to turn my back on my child,” he said, gesturing towards your belly. However, before he could continue though …

Daniel reached forwards to put his hand on her shoulder, but she flinched and pushed away. He awkwardly rubbed his hands and answered, "A... a few months now. I don't know why we did it, other than... It just kind of happened. I had no intention of leaving you for her, we just started seeing each other... And now she's pregnant."

All the blood looked as if it left Jen's face, as she looked at you in horror. "He put a fucking BABY in you?! Do you realize how long we've been trying?!"

Everything was happening so quickly. Your heart was pounding, and you knew that you'd done this to yourself. info.brief_description: You get the ability to swap traits with others and reality gets re-written each time.
info.description:
Your name is Bill Hopper, you are 21 and are attending University. One day you gain the power to swap physical traits or particular interests with other people. The Catch is that reality is changed so that it is as though you had always had that trait and the same goes for the other person. You are always aware of the changes but no one else is.

Basic rules:
1. No killing the main character
2. Try to keep good grammar
3. No other powers

Note: If you swap a body part, all the effects of having that body part will have taken place in the new reality. Same goes for swapping interests and other physical traits. (Ex: Swapping genitals with a girl will mean that female hormones will have been produced from them all your life so your body with take on a more feminine form which would include breasts.)
